versiculos.texto: Ketsutsi Kiritsitu matsiikime kanayeitiani, Kakaiyari mipai katinipitiani mipai mitiwahekiatiakaki miki hetsiena mieme memite'uximaya, mipai memitemaikaki kwitiwa kemitiyini[cite: 637]. Ketsutsi Kiritsitu yuniuki tuayame kaneyeni'ani Wani tiyu'uximayatsiriwame hixie matsiikiti mayuyeitianiki[cite: 638].
Kakaiyari niukieya kemaine, mipai nekatinihekiatani, Ketsutsi Kiritsitu kemitihekiata, kenemitixei yanekatinaka'utiani[cite: 639].
'Aixia kani'itiarieka kemi'ane mititeriwa, meta memi'enieka 'iki niuki kemitiuhekiatsie, xika yametekakine kemire'uxa 'ikitsie, tukari kaneutihuraniri yamitiyiniki[cite: 640].

Ne, Wani, nekatinixe'utiirieka 'atahuta kiekariyaritsie xemiyutixexeiriwa 'Atsiya kwieyaritsie [cite: 642]: 'Aixia ketiuka'iyarini xehetsiemieme, meta kexepitiaka yu'iyaritsie xemika'uximatiariekaki[cite: 643]. Mipai pitiyurieneni kemi'ane 'amuyeikakai meta 'amuyeika meta 'umamie, yaxeikiata 'atahuta 'iyarite miki 'uwenieya hixie memiti'u[cite: 643].
meta Ketsutsi Kiritsitu hepaitsita kemi'ane yatikamieti muyuhekiatakai, kemi'ane mikite memanuku'uni wamexiakame mihiki, kemi'ane kwiepa te'aitamete mitiwa'aitia[cite: 647].

Miki mitatsinaki'erie kanihikitini [cite: 648], meta yuxuriyaki mitatsi'utixinaxi 'axatemite'uyuriki [cite: 650], te'aitamete mitatsi'ayeitia [cite: 651], mawari wewiwamete Kakaiyari 'ukiyarieyatsie mieme temite'uximayakaki mitatsi'ayeitia [cite: 652, 653, 654, 655], miki witsiketikuxaxatsiwani meta kemititirikaiye, tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika[cite: 656]. Mipai xeikia kani'aneni[cite: 656].

Kami, haitsata pakaneni[cite: 657]. Yunaiti yuhixiki mekanixeiyakuni [cite: 658], meta yunaiti memeititseixia mekanix- eiyakuni [cite: 658, 660], mekaniyutiheiweriekuni me'ixeiyati yunaiti nuiwarite kwiepa memitama[cite: 659, 661]. Mipai katiniyimiki[cite: 662]. Mipai xeikia kani'aneni[cite: 662].

Ti'aitame Kakaiyari mipai kanaineni: «Ne Mexiakame meta 'Imatireme nekanihikitini, kemi'ane mitsutia meta minini, kemi'ane 'amuyeika, kemi'ane mihiki meta 'umamie Naimekimitirikaiye, nekanihikitini»[cite: 662].

Ne, Wani, xe'iwa nepihiki, xehepai nemiti'uximatiar tete'uka'eniwati Ketsutsi hetsie teyuxewiti [cite: 665], kwie Patimuxi mirakutewatsie haramara hixiapa miyematsie nekaneyeikakaitini Kakaiyari niukieyatsie nemitiwiyaki meta Ketsutsi hepaitsita netihekiatati[cite: 665, 669, 670, 671, 672, 673].
Ti'aitame tukarieyatsie 'Iyari nehetsie kaninuani, meta newarita xeime nekaniu'enieni karima 'utaniukame kuxineta hepai ti'eniiriikiti[cite: 674].

Mipai kaniutayini: «Tita pemitixeiya xapatsie ketinaka'utia, meta keneutani'axia 'atahuta kiekariyari memiyutixexeiriwa wahetsia: 'Epetsutsie, 'Etsimirinatsie, Perikamutsie, Tiyatiratsie, Tsaritixitsie, Piratepiyatsie meta Rautitseyatsie»[cite: 675].
Hiki ta'aurie nekanaweni metaniukakai nexeiyake, hiki kixeme 'uitiwame nekaniuxeiya 'atahutame huru tepiayariki wewiyatikaime[cite: 676].
Kixeme hixiapa mana xewiti puwekai <<<Yuri Tewi hepai tiyuxexeiyati» [cite: 677], 'etewime kamixa panakatikikai, meta huru hiiyameyariki panayikihiakai[cite: 677].
Kipateya putixawatirekai pututuxakai muxa huxarieya hepai, 'iwi hepai meta hixiteya tai mitatikani hepai pituyuxexeiyakai[cite: 678].
Ketateya tepia mixawati hepai pitiyuxexeiyakai huxunuta xiriyariekame, niukieya waikawa haa hepai putatirarikakai[cite: 679].

Yutserieta xurawetsixi 'atahutame kaniwaratikikaitini [cite: 680], meta tetana piwayeneikakai 'ixipara naitsata heutixikakauniti[cite: 680]. Nierikaya tau kemitixawati hepai pitiyuxexeiyakai[cite: 680].
Kepauka nemixei, hetiana nekaniukaweni nemumini hepai ne'aneti [cite: 681], miki yutserieki nehetsie kaneutimeni mipai 'utaiti: «Pepikamaka[cite: 681].

Ne mexiakame meta 'imatireme nekanihikitini [cite: 682], meta nemayeniere nepihiki[cite: 683]. Tsepa nemumikai, matsi hiki nepayeniere tsepa xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika [cite: 683, 687, 688, 689], tiyepiwame meta nekana'ika memitakukuwe wahetsiemieme meta mikite wateukiyapa hetsiemieme[cite: 690, 691, 692, 693].
>>'Ayumieme nepaine, ketinaka'utia tita pemitixeiya [cite: 694], hiki kemitiyiane [cite: 694], meta 'arike kemitiyini[cite: 694].

'Ipai katinimatsiikini niuki mi'awietsiekai 'atahuta xurawetsixi netserieta newaratikime peminetsi'uxei hepaitsita [cite: 695], meta 'atahutame kixeme 'uitiwame huruki wewiyatikaime pemuxei hepaitsita [cite: 695]: Miki xurawetsixi 'atahuta pemiwaruxei, niuki tuayamete mekanihikitini 'atahuta kiekariyaritsie memiyutixexeiriwa puwahetsiemieme [cite: 695], meta kixeme 'uitiwame miki memiyutixexeiriwa 'atahuta kiekaritetsie mepihiki[cite: 695].

>>Mipai ketineu'utiiri niuki tuayame 'Epetsutsie memiyutixexeiriwa wahetsiemieme [cite: 701, 702]: Mipai paine kemi'ane yutserieta miwaratiki xurawetsixi 'atahutame [cite: 704], meta 'atahutame kixeme 'uitiwame huruki miwewiyatika wahixiapa muyeika[cite: 704]:

Neri mipai nepitimate kepemitiyuriene peti'a'uxitiati petiuka'eniwati[cite: 705, 706]. Mipaita nepitimate, 'axamemiteyurie pepitiwanewirie, peru memikahiki, pepiwaretima memite'itawaki [cite: 711, 712]. pepiwaruta'iniataxi miki ni'ariekate memuyuxata[cite: 713].
Pepitiuka'eniwa, waikawameki pepitiukanewie nehetsia pemimiemeki, pekatihayewati[cite: 714, 715, 716, 717, 718, 719].
Peru matsi 'ahepaitsita tixaiti nepitixani'erie, matiari kepemitiyukanaki'eriekai pemitiuhayewaxiki[cite: 721, 722, 723, 724, 725, 726, 727].

'Ayumieme nepaine, kenayuye'eri kepemi'anekai matiari hepai, 'arike kepemitiuhayewaxi[cite: 728]. Hikiri mipai ketinetimati kepemitiyurienekai, matiari hepai pita ketine'uximayaka[cite: 728]. Mexika pekatiuhayewa, nepunuani 'ahetsia, 'akixeme 'uitiwame nepiwatihana huyeritana[cite: 729, 730].
Tsiere tixaiti pepirexeiya pewa'uxiwe'erieti tita memiteyurie miki nikuraitatsixi wahetsie, neta miki nepi'uxiwe'erie[cite: 731].

Kemi'ane mu'enaxi, ke'u'ena 'Iyari kemitiwatahiawe memiyutixexeiriwa[cite: 732, 733]. Kemi'ane mirayu'iwa, heitserie nepipitiani 'iteiri tukari tiyupitiwame metikwaniki, Kakaiyari harawerita mewe[cite: 734].

>>Mipai ketineu'utiiri niuki tuayame 'Etsimirinatsie memiyutixexeiriwa wahetsiemieme [cite: 738]: Mipai kanaineni kemi'ane Mexiakame meta 'Imatireme mihiki, meta kemi'ane mumikai manutanierixita[cite: 739]:

Neri mipai nepitimate kepemiti'uximatiarie [cite: 743], meta tixaiti pemikarexeiya[cite: 744]. Matsi 'eki pekanixikutini[cite: 745]. Mipai nepitimate kememitexetsewixima huriyutsixi memite'uyuteriwa [cite: 746, 748, 749], matsi yuriki mepikahuriyutsixi [cite: 750], miki Kauyumarie tukita mepimiemete pita[cite: 751, 752].

Pepikaheumaka tsepa kepemitikwinitiarieni[cite: 753]. Nepimatsihaye'eritiani xeme hipati kauyumarie katsariyanata pixe'anutaxirieni mixeta'iniataki [cite: 753], meta xepitekwine xetaweiyariexiame tamamata tukari[cite: 753]. Matsi yuri ketine'erieka tsepa pemumi, ne kuruna tukari mitiyupitiwa nekameniyetuiriemiki[cite: 754].
Kemi'ane meu'ena, ke'u'ena 'Iyari kemitiwatahiawe memiyutixexeiriwa[cite: 755, 756, 757]. Kemi'ane memitehayu'iwa, miki hutarieka tiuka'eniwati pikamini[cite: 758].
>>Mipai ketineu'utiiri niuki tuayame Perikamutsie wahetsiemieme [cite: 762, 763, 764, 765, 766, 767]: Mipai kanaineni kemi'ane 'ixipara naitsata meutixikakauni mexeiya[cite: 768, 769]:

Neri nepitimate hakewa pemeka: mana Kauyumarie 'uwenieya pewe hakewa mire'aita[cite: 770]. Matsi, 'eki pepika'aku'imawa yuri peti'erieti nehetsie meta pepikatiuhayewaxi, tsepa miki tukaritsie kepauka 'Anitipa miyuhekiatakai yatikamieti kenemainekai, miki nehetsia miemetiti tiukwineka pumierie miki kiekariyaritsie Kauyumarie manuka[cite: 771, 774].

Perutsi ne nepirayexeiya 'ahepaitsita: muwa pemiwarexeiyaki miki Warami 'ikitsikayatsie memitewiya, mipai pitita'ikitia Waraki miwakunuitianiki 'ixaheritsixi, kakaiyarixi memitemawiyarie memitekwakaki miwa'iniekaki, meta hipame wakinama wa'iitama memiwakumaiwaniki[cite: 775].
Yaxeikia 'eki pepiwarexeiya hipame nikuraitatsixi wa'ikitsikatsie memitewiya[cite: 776].
'Ayumieme nepaine, ketineuhayewa kepemitiyuriene[cite: 777]. Mexika pekatiuhayewa, kwitiwa nepunuani wahetsia nepinemieneni ne'ixipara neteta mayeneikaki[cite: 777].

Kemi'ane mu'enaxi, ke'u'ena 'Iyari kemitiwatahiawe memiyutixexeiriwa[cite: 778]. Kemi'ane mirayu'iwa, ne manana payari mi'awietsie nepimini [cite: 779], meta tete mituxa nepiyetuirieni ra'utiariekame hekwameki kemititewaka[cite: 779]. Xewiti mipai pikatimaika, kemi'ane xeikia mitanaki'erieni[cite: 779].

»Mipai ketineu'utiiri niuki tuayame Tiyatiratsie memiyutixexeiriwa wahetsiemieme [cite: 783]: Mipai kanaineni Kakaiyari Nu'aya [cite: 784], kemi'ane yihixie tai mitaka hepai maye'ane [cite: 784], meta kemi'ane tepia hepai 'ikateya mixawawati[cite: 784]:

'A'uximayatsikate nepitimate, 'anaki'eriya [cite: 785], meta yuri kepemiti'erie [cite: 785], kepemitiwaparewie hipame [cite: 785], meta kepemitiuka'eniwa [cite: 785], mipai nepitimate [cite: 787], matsi waikawa pepitiyuriene, matiaripai 'etsiwa pepitiyurienekai[cite: 790, 792, 793, 794].

Perutsi ne nepirayexeiya 'ahepaitsita [cite: 795], Ketsaweri 'ukaratsi pemipitiaki yamitiyurieneniki kemitinake [cite: 796, 797], niukame piyuxata Kakaiyari hetsia mieme[cite: 797]. Peru kemiti'ikita, pitiwa'itaiya nehetsia miemete te'uximayatamete memiwakumaiwaniki kemi'ane mikayikina mikayi'iya [cite: 797], meta memikwakaki tita kakaiyarixi memitemawiyarie[cite: 798].
Ne tukari nepipitia mitihayewaniki kemitiyuriene, peru pikayuwairiya mitihayewaki wakumaiwati memikayikinama[cite: 799].

'Ayumieme nepitikwinitiani, 'utayatsie nepeikahiani [cite: 800], meta memikumaiwakai kawa'iyatikaku hamatiana nepitiwakwinitiani waikawameki [cite: 800], xika mekatehayewani hepaina meteyurieti[cite: 800].

Niwemama nepiwakwini[cite: 801]. Mipai netiyurieyu yunaiti naitsarie memiyutixexeiriwa mipai mepitemaika [cite: 801], ne nepihiki xe'iyari nemimate kexemiteyikihiawe[cite: 801]. Yuxexuime nepitixe'apinirieni kexemite'uyuri[cite: 801].

Peru hipati xeme Tiyatiratsie xemitama, keyupaimeti 'iki 'ikitsikatsie xemikatewiya [cite: 802], keyupaimeti 'ateewa xemikaheutahaxiawawe xeteyi'ikitiati Kauyumarie 'ikitsikayaki kememiteniniuki [cite: 802], mipai nepitixekihiawe xeme, tawariri kwinimieme nepikaxe'ikatiaka[cite: 802].
Mikitsie xeikia, xeketenewiyani ketitari xemitehexeiya [cite: 803], kepaukake nemunuani[cite: 803].
Kemi'ane mirayu'iwa, meta mikatihayewani nehepai tiyurieneti tapareyuke [cite: 804, 808, 809, 810], miki heitserie nekanipitiamiki nuiwarite mitiwa'aitiakaki [cite: 811]
-neta heitserie ne'ukiyari- keminetiupitia [cite: 812, 813, 814] "tepia 'itsiyari 'akweti pitiwa'aitiaka [cite: 815], haxu xariyari hepai piwatitara"[cite: 816].
Metatsiere nepiyetuirieni xurawe ximeripaiti manatineika[cite: 817, 818].
Kemi'ane mu'enaxi, ke'u'ena 'Iyari kemitiwatahiawe memiyutixexeiriwa[cite: 819, 820, 821, 822].

>>Mipai ketineu'utiiri niuki tuayame Tsaritixitsie memiyutixexeiriwa wahetsiemieme [cite: 827]: Mipai kanaineni kemi'ane Kakaiyari 'iyariteya 'atahutame miwarexeiya [cite: 828], meta xurawetsixi 'atahutame [cite: 828]: Neri mipai nepitimate kepemitiyuriene[cite: 828]. Tsepa pe'ayeniereti pemixatsiwa, peru pepimiki[cite: 828].

Kenanutahitia, keneutatirikariya tita mikatimiwe mitiuyuhayewaxi miki mimiximeki [cite: 829], nekakaiyari kemimetixeiya, nematsixeiyakaku ne, kepemitiyuriene peuyewetse 'akuxi pemiraye'atianiki[cite: 829].

'Ayumieme nepaine, ketina'eriwani kepemitiu'enaxi [cite: 830, 831], kepemitiupitiarie mipai yaketinekamieni [cite: 832], ketineuhayewa kepemitiyuriene hiki[cite: 832]. Mexika peka'enutahitiani, tinawayame hepai nepunuani, 'atsipepikatimaika kepaukatikaku 'ahetsia nemunuani[cite: 833, 836].
Tsiereta hipame pepiwarexeiya teiteri Tsaritixitsie memitama yu'ixuriki memikatiniriya[cite: 837]. Miki 'aixia memite'u'iyariki nehamatia mekaniu'uwakuni me'anakatuxati[cite: 837].

Kemi'ane mirayu'iwa, miki wahepai pitikemaritiarieni 'ixuriki mutuxaki[cite: 838]. Hatsuaku kemititewa nepikaheyeitiani hakewa maka'utsie kename tukari hexeiya[cite: 838]. Nepinehekiatani kename ne'imate, mipai ne'utaiti ne'ukiyari hixie meta hetsiana miemete niuki tuayamete wahixie[cite: 839].
Kemi'ane mu'enaxi, ke'u'ena 'Iyari kemitiwatahiawe memiyutixexeiriwa[cite: 840].

>>Hiki mipai ketineu'utiiri niuki tuayame Piratepiyatsie mimieme [cite: 844, 845, 846, 847]: Mipai kanaineni kemi'ane Kakaiyaritsie mieme mipatsie, kemi'ane yuri maine, kemi'ane Rawiri yawieya makwe'e [cite: 848, 849]. reuyepieyu xewiti pikareunani, reunayu xewiti pikareuyepieni[cite: 849]:

Neri mipai nepitimate kepemitiyuriene[cite: 850]. Kamitsi, kitenie mireuyepie nepimatsi'uxeiyatsitia[cite: 850]. Xewiti pikayiwe mireunaniki[cite: 850]. 'Etsiwa xeikia tirikariya pepexeiya peru neniukitsie yapepitikamie, pepika'aku'imawa kename miki pekanetsimate pe'utaiti[cite: 851, 852, 853, 854].

Kamitsi mipai nepitiwapitiaka Kauyumarie tukitana memimiemete [cite: 855, 856], miki huriyutsixi teiteriyari memite'uyuteriwa peru memikahiki, memite'itawa xeikia [cite: 857], kamitsi miki nepiwarahapani, me'a'iwarieme memitihixima'uniki 'ahetia[cite: 860]. 'Ana mipai mepitehetimani, nemimatsinaki'erieki 'eki[cite: 861].
Neniukitsie yapemitikatiaki petiuka'eniwati nehepai [cite: 863, 864], neta nepimatsi'iwiyani kepauka tukari maye'ani kwiepa naitsarie, kepauka kwiepa memitama memi'iniatsieni[cite: 864].

Kwiti nepunuani[cite: 865]. Keneuwiya tita pemirexeiya [cite: 866], xewiti 'akuruna kanekakaiyari matsi'unawairieniki 'a'iniari[cite: 868, 869, 870, 871]. Kemi'ane mirayu'iwa, tukitana nepikakeni 'ikitsaraitime [cite: 872], yuheyemeki pikawayeyani hatsuaku[cite: 872]. Hetsiena nepira'utiani nekakaiyari kemititewa, nekakaiyari kiekarieya Kerutsareme mihekwa taheima makaneni nekakaiyari hetsia miemetiti kemititewa, neta hekwameki kenemititewa[cite: 872].
Xewiti neti mu'enaxi, ke'i'enieka tita 'Iyari mitiwatahiawe memiyutixexeiriwa[cite: 873].

>>Hiki mipai ketineu'utiiri niuki tuayame Rautitseyatsie memiyutixexeiriwa [cite: 877]: 'Ipai kanaineni kemi'ane Niukieya Mitse'i mititewa [cite: 878], kemi'ane yatikamieti yuri haiti miyuhekiata [cite: 878], kemi'ane mitsutia tita Kakaiyari mitiunetia[cite: 878]:
Neri 'a'uximayatsika nepimate[cite: 879]. Pepikahaiti meta nitima pepikaxika [cite: 879], xikatiyiwenike pehaitinike meta pexikanike[cite: 882].
Hiki matsi pemikahaitiki meta pemikaxikaki, matsi xeikia 'etsiwa mixika hepai pemi'aneki, 'ayumieme 'ari nekamenanatihayaximeni[cite: 886].

'Eki mipai pekaniutaineni: "Ne nepixiku, waikawa nerexeiyati nepaneyeitia, tixaiti nepikareuyehiwa" [cite: 887], pe'utaiti, 'atsipepikatimate kepemi'ane, 'axapepi'itiarie tixaiti pepikarexeiya, pepikaheuniere, meta 'ixurikiki pepimawe[cite: 887].

'Ayumieme nepimatitaxatiani, nehetsia keneunanai huru tuminiyari taipa kwaxiyariekameki [cite: 888], mikiki xiku pemayaniki [cite: 888], 'ixuriki mituxa keneunanai pemenakatiniki [cite: 888], mikiki pikamatsiikini kepemiti'atewiya pemaweti [cite: 888], meta hixita mieme kwiniya 'uayeyari keneunanai pema'awiriexianiki [cite: 888], mikiki peheuniereti pepayani[cite: 888].
Keyupaimeme nemiwanaki'erie, miki nepiwatate'a nepitiwa'ikitia newa'uximatiati[cite: 889]. 'Ayumieme 'aixia 'anemeki kene'awairiyani, ketineuhayewa kepemitiyuriene hiki[cite: 889].

Neuxei 'itupari warita neputiwe neheihutsunati[cite: 890]. Tewi xika netsi'u'enieni ne'utaniukakaku, xika reuyepieni, nepeutahani hetsiana, hamatiana nepitikwani, mikita nehamatia pitikwani[cite: 890].
Kemi'ane mirayu'iwa, miki nekanipitiamiki nehamatia mayeriniki ne'uwenitsie hakewa nemire'aita [cite: 891], neta ne'ukiyari hamatia kenemiraya 'uwenieyatsie nerane'iwaka[cite: 891].
Xewiti neti mu'enaxi, ke'u'ena tita 'Iyari mitiwatahiawe memiyutixexeiriwa»[cite: 892, 893].

Merikitsi miki ne'uxeiyaka, tawarita nekaneutaniere [cite: 901], mana muyuawi nekaniuxeiya reuyepiekame[cite: 901]. Kemi'ane nemu'eni matiari paiti kuxineta hepai ti'eniiriikime nehamatia tikuxatame, miki mipai kanetiniutahiawe: «'Uwa kenatiye'a: nepimetsixeiyatsitiani kemitiyini 'arike»[cite: 902].
Yapauka 'Iyari nehetsie punua, meta 'uweni nepuxei muyuawitsie, xewiti mikitsie kanakateitini[cite: 903].
Kemi'ane mana makatei, katsipe teteyari hepai katiniyuxexeiyakaitini meta kurunarina teteyari hepai[cite: 904].
'Uweni warita kuwiwi kanakateitini 'etsimerarita teteyari hepai tiyuxexeiyati[cite: 905].

'Uweni 'aurie kana'utikateitini 'uwenite xeitewiyari heimana naukati [cite: 906], 'uwenitetsie 'ukirawetsixi mekanatekaitini xeitewiyari heimana yunaukati me'anakatuxati [cite: 906], yumu'utsie huru kurunayari me'anamanati[cite: 906]. Miki 'uweni manuwekaitsie mana kaniwayemerikarekaitini, kaneyeyuanekaitini meta kaneyetirarikakaitini[cite: 907]. 'Uweni hixie 'atahutati kixemete kanikutatawekaitini, 'atahutati Kakaiyari 'iyariteya mihikitikai[cite: 907].

meta hixiena haramara xikiri hepai tiyuxexeiyati kanikumakaitini tete manuyehekia hepai tiyuxexeiyati[cite: 908]. 'Uweni 'aurie mana mekaniu'uwakaitini yunaukati memayeneniere yu- naukati memayeneniere [cite: 909], mehahixitikaiti yuhixie meta yuwarita naitsarie[cite: 909].

Mexiakame maye hepai pitiyuxexeiyakai [cite: 913], hutarieka mieme tuuru hepai pitiyuxexeiyakai [cite: 913], hairieka mieme tewi hepai piraka'eriekai [cite: 913], naurieka mieme kwixu mitawixime hepai pitiyuxexeiyakai[cite: 913].

Miki yunaukati memayeneniere yuxexuiti 'ataxewime 'anate mepexeiyakai [cite: 914], meta naitsarie yu'anatetia paiti mekanahixitikateitini[cite: 914]. Tukariki meta tikariki mepikatehayewakai mipai me'utiyuati: <<Kanipatsieka, kanipatsieka, kanipatsieka Ti'aitame Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye [cite: 915], kemi'ane 'amuyeikakai, kemi'ane 'amuyeika meta kemi'ane 'umamie»[cite: 915].

Kepauka mipai memutiyuanekai miki memayeneniere [cite: 916], 'aixia ketikuxaxatsiwani [cite: 916], mariweti kemariwani [cite: 916], pamipariyutsi kepitiarieka kemi'ane 'uwenitsie maka [cite: 916], tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika ke'ayeniereni yuheyemeki me'utiyuati[cite: 916],

xeitewiyari heimana nauka 'ukirawetsixi hixiena mepukahixima'uwekai meta nenewieri me'ipitiati kemi'ane 'uwenitsie maka [cite: 917], tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika ke'ayeniereni yuheyemeki[cite: 917]. Yukurunate hixiena mekanitimanakaitini mipai me'utiyuati[cite: 918]:

<<Tati'aitiwame Takakaiyari 'aku, 'aixia pepitiuka'iyari [cite: 920, 921], 'ahetsie mitinakeniki pemitikuxaxatsiwaniki [cite: 922, 924], 'aixia mariwemeki pemimariwaniki [cite: 925, 926], meta kepemititirikaiye [cite: 927], 'eki naime pepitiunetia [cite: 928], mipai mimatinakeki pitiuxuawe [cite: 929], naiti 'ayumieme pitiutiwewiya»[cite: 933].
Merikitsi kemi'ane 'uwenitsie makatei yutserieta xapa kwikwiekame 'akwekame nekaniuxeiya naitsata ra'utikaime meta 'atahuta tseyuyari pamanekai[cite: 936].
Yaxeikiata niuki tuayame mitirikaiye nekaniuxeiya mipai 'utaineme karima: «¿Kepaiki 'aixia pitiuka'iyari hetsiena mitinakeniki tseyu maxinaxianiki, meta xapa manutayepieniki?» [cite: 937]
Muyuawitsie kwiepa meta kwietia nixewiti pikayiwekai xapa manutayepieniki, mixeiyaki ketiti mireku'ukai[cite: 938].
Ne waikawa neputatsuakakai xewiti mikataxeiyariewekaiki 'aixia tiuka'iyariti hetsiena mitinakeniki xapa manutayepieniki, mixeiyaki mekateriwaki[cite: 939].

Miki 'ukiratsi xewiti mipai kanetiniutahiawe: «Pepika'utatsuakani, neuxei maye hepai mariweti Kura nuiwarieyatsie mieme Rawiri kie Nana mutine, miki pirayu'iwaxi, mikitsi kaniyiweni xapa manutayepieniki, meta 'atahutame tseyuyari maxinaxianiki»[cite: 940].

Hiki mana nekaneutaniere[cite: 941]. 'Uweni 'aurie yunaukati memayeneniere wahixiapa 'ukirawetsixi wahixiapa nekanixeiya Muxa Nunutsi mana 'uweme[cite: 941]. Mumierie hepai pitiyuxexeiyakai, 'atahuta 'awayari 'atahuta hixiyari pexeiyakai [cite: 942], hixiteya Kakaiyari 'iyariteya kanihikitini 'atahutati [cite: 942], naitsarie kwiepa meutani'ariexia[cite: 942].
'Iya 'ahurawa kanayani [cite: 946], kemi'ane 'uwenitsie makatei yutserieta mehuriekai xapa kanihuritiani[cite: 946].

Kepauka xapa muhuritiarie, yunaukati memayeneniere xeitewiyari heimana yunaukati 'ukirawetsixi yunaiti mekaniutihixima'uni Muxa hixie[cite: 947]. Yuxexuiti haripa mekaniu'ikaitini huru xakiyari mepu'ikai 'ikwaki hipineme [cite: 948], 'ikwa Kakaiyari teiterimama wanenewieri kanihikitini[cite: 948].

Hiki kwikari hekwame mekaniutakwika mipai me'utiyuati: <<'Aixia pepitiuka'iyari 'ahetsie mitinakeniki pemenuhuriēniki xapa pemexinaxianiki tseyuyari [cite: 949, 950, 951], 'eki pemumierieki [cite: 952], 'axuriya mutayeuriki Kakaiyaritsie mieme pepiwarutinanai teiteri pewaxinake [cite: 953], yunaime nuiwarite wahetsia miemete naime niukiki memutiniuka, naitsarie kwiepa kiekatari yunaime teiteriyari wahetsia miemete[cite: 954].
Takakaiyari teiterimama pepitatsi'ayeitia te'aitamete [cite: 955], mawari wewiwamete pepitatsi'ayeitia [cite: 956], kwiepa tepite'aitani»[cite: 956].

Hiki neheutaniereka nekani'enieni tita yumiireme niuki tuayamete waniuki hepai miti'eniiriikikai [cite: 957], 'uweni 'aurie memayeneniere wa'aurie 'ukirawetsixi wa'aurie mekaniti'ukaitini miireme miyuniyari meyupaimeti[cite: 957].

Mipai karima mekaniutiyuanekaitini: «Muxa mumierie, 'aixia katiniuka'iyarini, hetsiena mitinakeniki [cite: 958], tirikaiyeti waikawa rexeiyati, timaiweti yiweti [cite: 962], mimariwaniki 'aixia miraniuwaniki [cite: 963], 'aixia mitikuxaxatsiwaniki witsimitikihiawariwaniki»[cite: 964, 965, 966, 967].

Hiki naiti mitiunetiarie muyuawitsie, kwiepa, kwie hetia meta haramaratsie, naiti mana mititama, yunaime nekatiniwaru'enieni mete'iniawame [cite: 968]: <<Kemi'ane 'uwenitsie maka, meta muxa, witsimeketekihiawariwani [cite: 969, 970], mekekuxaxatsiwani [cite: 971], mariwemeki witsimeketekuxaxatsiwani [cite: 972], tirikaiyemeki [cite: 973], tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika»[cite: 974, 977, 978].
Memayeneniere yunaukati mipai mekaniutiyuanekaitini: «Mipai ketiiyini me'utiyuati [cite: 979], meta 'ukirawetsixi metihixima'uti nenewieri mekanipitiakaitini kemi'ane yuheyemeki mayeniere[cite: 979].

Merikitsi nekaneutaniere kepauka Muxa Nunutsi mexinaxi xeime 'atahuta tseyuyaritsie mieme [cite: 982], yunaukati memayeneniere xeime nekaniu'enieni mipai haineme tiranari hepai ti'eniiriikime: «Kenaye'a, keneuxeiya»[cite: 982].

Hiki nekaneutaniere, mana kawayu heutuxati kaniuwekaitini[cite: 983]. Kemi'ane hetsiena makatei tupi pakwekai [cite: 983], kuruna kananutimaniyarieni [cite: 983], kanayeyani rayu'iwaka, miwara'iwaniki hipame[cite: 983].
Hiki kepauka Muxa tseyu hutarieka mieme maxinaxi, mayeniere hutarieka mieme nekaniu'enieni mipai 'utaineme: «Kenaye'a keneuxeiya»[cite: 987].

Hiki xewiti kawayu kaniwayeyani heuxureti[cite: 988]. Kemi'ane hetsiena makatei mipai katiniupitiarieni miwamuinaniki kwiepa memitama 'aixia memikateyuxeiyaniki, memiyukwiniki, 'ixipara 'amitewi pukweitiarie[cite: 988].

Hiki kepauka Muxa tseyu hairieka mieme maxinaxi, mayeniere nekaniu'enieni hairieka mieme mipai 'utaineme: «Kenaye'a keneuxeiya»[cite: 989]. Hiki nekaneutaniere[cite: 990]. Kawayu heuyiwiti mana kaniuwekaitini[cite: 990]. Kemi'ane hetsiena makatei kiru ti'ininiatame kanahapakaitini yumamatsie[cite: 990].

Hiki xeime nekaniu'enieni yunaukati memayeneniere memati'ukai wahixiapa heyeniukame[cite: 991]. Mipai hetaineme: «Tiriku merie kakuniyari mipai ketinaye'atia xeitukari tewi kemiti'iwa [cite: 991], tsewara meta xeikakuniyari yaxeikia raye'arikame [cite: 991], 'axapepika'iyurieka wiya meta kaxie winuyari»[cite: 991].
Hiki kepauka Muxa tseyu naurieka mieme maxinaxi, mayeniere nekaniu'enieni naurieka mieme mipai 'utaineme: «Kenaye'a keneuxeіуа»[cite: 992].

Hiki nekaneutaniere, kawayu 'etsiwa heutaxaiyeti mana kaniuwekaitini[cite: 993]. Kemi'ane hetsiena manakatei Miiya pititewakai meta Tai mikatiwe kanihuraweiyakaitini[cite: 993]. Heitserie mekaniupitiarieni kwiepa memitama naukame hetsie mieme xeime wahepaitsita [cite: 994], kememiteyupaime memiwakwiniki 'ixiparaki, hakaki, kwiniyaki meta kwiepa miemete yeutari waheki[cite: 994, 998].

Hiki kepauka Muxa tseyu 'auxiwirieka mieme maxinaxia, mawari taiyame hetia 'iyarite me'atekame nekaniwaruxeiya [cite: 999], miki memukwi'iwaxi Kakaiyari niukieyatsie memitewiyakaiki [cite: 999], hetsiena metewiyati memiyuhekiatakaiki[cite: 999].

Karima mekaniutihiwakaitini mipai me'utiyuati: «¿Kutsiyari 'aku pemipatsie, yuri pemaine, kepaukake pepiwatakwewieni, kepaukake 'uximatiarika pepiwapitiani kwiepa memitama taxuriya memutayeuriki?» [cite: 1000]

Hiki yuxexuiti m mekaniutahuritiarieni 'ixuriki mituxa memanakatiniki [cite: 1001], mipai mepite'utahiawarie memi'uxipiekaki [cite: 1001], te'uximayatamete memikayunaititikaiki 'akuxi wa'iwama memikwi'iwakekai wahepai[cite: 1001].
Hiki kepauka Muxa nemuxei tseyu 'ataxewirieka mieme kanaxina, 'ana kwie karima kaniutayuanekaitini[cite: 1002].
Tau puyirixi 'ikari miyiwi hepai [cite: 1003], metseri naiti xuriya hepai 'aneti kanayani[cite: 1003].

Xurawetsixi muyuawitsie memeukatekai mekaniukaxirieni kwiepa, xapa takariyari kemitikaxiriwe hepai waikawa 'uku'ekakaku[cite: 1004]. Muyuawi hixiapa putsanixi xapa mitakwikwiyani hepai [cite: 1005], naiti yemurite meta haramara hixiapa miyetekai xaitsie pita pupatsie, hakewa metinierekai pumawekai[cite: 1005].

Hiki kwiepa te'aitamete, wawemete, kuyaxi wa'ukiyarima, xikutsixi, memitirikawikai [cite: 1006], meta hipati, yunaiti wairiyarika memite'uximayatametetikai, meta memiyini'akai [cite: 1006], yunaiti mekaniuyuti'awietaxiani terita, 'aita, meta hiritetsie[cite: 1010].
Mipai hirite meta 'aite mekateniuhiwakaitini: <<Ketananukanama, ketaneuti'awieta mikatatsixeiyaki kemi'ane 'uwenitsie maka Muxa nunutsi mikatatsihekaniki[cite: 1011].
Kariki tukari mimariwe kanaye'aniri [cite: 1012] kepauka memiyeha'ani[cite: 1013]. ¿Kepaiki piyiwe 'amuweni?» meputiyuanekai[cite: 1014].

Merikitsi 'ana niuki tuayamete yunaukame nekaniwaruxeiya, tatserieta, ta'utata, tahixiapa, tatsutia naitsata 'etsikinatsie meti'uti 'eka mepikapitiakai [cite: 1018], naitsarie mika'uyeikaniki kwiepa, haramaratsie meta naime kiyexitetsie[cite: 1018, 1019].

Hiki xeime nekaniuxeiya niuki tuayame tau manatineika 'utimiekame, Kakaiyari mayeniere tseyuya 'akweti[cite: 1020]. Hiki karima kaniwarutahiwieni niuki tuayamete yunaukame, miki mipai memitepitiariekai 'axamemiyurieniki kwiepa meta haramara[cite: 1021].
<<'Akuxi 'axaxepika'iyurieka kwie, haramara meta naime kiyexite [cite: 1022], tekawatitseyumawekaku takakaiyari te'uximayatametemama wakanata»[cite: 1022].

Hiki 'iniarite nekaniu'enieni, kememiyupaimekai memutseyumarie [cite: 1023]: Xeitsienituyari heimana huta tewiyari heimana nauka miriyari (144.000) meyupaimeti mekaniutseyumarieni 'Ixaheri nuiwarimama[cite: 1023, 1024]. Xexuiti nuiwarite mepuxuawekai[cite: 1024].

Kura nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari mekaniutseyumarieni [cite: 1028, 1029, 1030, 1031], Xuweni nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari [cite: 1032, 1033], Kari nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari[cite: 1034, 1035, 1036],

'Atseri nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari [cite: 1037, 1038], Nepitahari nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari [cite: 1039], Manatsexi nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari[cite: 1040, 1041],

Tsimiyuni nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari [cite: 1042], Rewi nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari [cite: 1043], 'Itsakaxi nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari[cite: 1044, 1045],

Tsawuruni nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari [cite: 1046], Kutse nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari [cite: 1047, 1048], Wenikamini nuiwarieyatsie miemete tamamata heimana huta miriyari mekaniutseyumarieni[cite: 1049, 1050, 1051, 1052].

Merikitsi 'ana nekaneutaniere [cite: 1054], yumiireme nekaniwaruxeiya naitsarie kiekari, nuiwarite, kiekari mukumanetsie meta kememite'uniukakai [cite: 1055], tewi pikayiwekai miwaruti'iniataki[cite: 1055]. Mana 'uweni hixie meta Muxa hixie mekaniti'ukaitini me'anakatuxati [cite: 1055, 1059], taki me'upiti[cite: 1059].
Karima mipai mekateniuhiwakaitini: <<<Wikweitsitiarika takakaiyari kanayeneikani [cite: 1060, 1061, 1062], 'uwenitsie maka [cite: 1064], meta Muxa»[cite: 1065].

Yunaiti niuki tuayamete mana mekaniti'ukaitini 'uweni 'aurie [cite: 1067], 'ukirawetsixi wa'aurie [cite: 1067], meta yunaukati memayeneniere wa'aurie[cite: 1067]. Hiki mekaniutihixima'uni 'uweni hixie [cite: 1067], Kakaiyari nenewieri mekaniupitiani [cite: 1068]

mipai me'utiyuati: «Mipai ketiuyini[cite: 1070]. Witsiketikihiawariwani [cite: 1071], 'aixia ketikuxaxatsiwanini [cite: 1072], timaiweti kemariwani [cite: 1073], pamipariyutsi kepitiarieka [cite: 1075], mariweti kexatsiwani [cite: 1076], tirikaiyeti yiweti kexatsiwani [cite: 1077], takakaiyari tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika[cite: 1078, 1079]. Mipai ketiuyini»[cite: 1080].
Merikitsi xewiti 'ukiratsi mipai kanetiniuta'iwawiya: -Miki memanakatuxa, ¿kehate mepiyia, hakewa mepeyeki? [cite: 1081, 1082]

Ne mipai nekatinita'eiya: -Neuxei, matsi 'eki yapepitimate[cite: 1083, 1084]. Miki mipai kanetiniutahiawe: -Miki mekanihikitini memu'axia waikawa metehekwineka[cite: 1086, 1087]. Yu'ixuriki mekaniuti'ekwa, meta mekanituriya Muxa Nunutsi mumierie xuriyayaki[cite: 1088].

'Ayumieme Kakaiyari 'uwenieya hixie mekaniti'uka [cite: 1092, 1093], tukariki meta tikariki hetsiena mieme tukitana mekateni'uximayaka [cite: 1094], Hatsuakuri mepikaheuhakakwikuni [cite: 1095], meta kemi'ane 'uwenitsie maka, piwateitani wa'iwiyati yutukita[cite: 1096, 1097].
Kariki pikawaxirimitiaka [cite: 1104], xiri mepikaheuharikuni[cite: 1105]. Tau pikawa'uximatiaka[cite: 1100, 1101].

Muxa yu'uwenitsie 'akaiti miki piwa'iwiyani muxatsi wahiweme hepai yianeti [cite: 1106], piwarewitikini naitsarie haixa mukunenieretsie mana mehareti memayeneniēreniki [cite: 1107], meta Kakaiyari naime wa'ukai kana'itiexiamiki wahixita[cite: 1108].
Merikitsi kepauka Muxa 'atahutarieka mieme tseyu maxinaxi, muyuawitsie kayuwati putamarixi merie hurayari pireuterixi[cite: 1111].
Hiki niuki tuayamete 'atahuta memiti'u Kakaiyari hixie memiti'u nekaniwaruxeiya [cite: 1112], miki kuxineta yuxexuiti mekaniuta'iitiarieni[cite: 1112].

Hiki xewiti niuki tuayame 'ahurawa kaniuyani [cite: 1113], meta mawari taiyame 'aurie kaniutakeni pitsiwiwame huruki wewiyakame 'ahanati meta 'ikwa witsimu'ia kaniyetuiriyarieni mimawaniki [cite: 1113], yunaime Kakaiyari teiterimama wanenewieritsie mieme [cite: 1113], mawari taiyame hetsie huruki muwewiya 'uweni hixie muwekai[cite: 1117].
Hiki 'ikwa kwauniyari meta Kakaiyari tuayame teiterimama wanenewieri, niuki 'etukaku Kakaiyari hetsie kaniye'ani[cite: 1118, 1119, 1120].

Hiki niuki tuayame 'enuhanaka pitsiwiwame [cite: 1121], tii 'utahiniyaka mawari taiyame hetsie [cite: 1121], kwiepa kaneihiani [cite: 1121], pekutirarikakai putayuanekai, pukumerikakai meta kwie putayua[cite: 1121].
Hiki niuki tuayamete 'atahutatati, kuxineta memi'ikai memiyukuha'aritiani tihitsieniki[cite: 1124, 1125].

Hiki mexiakame yukuxineta kaniutahitsieni[cite: 1126]. Tee taimati xuriya niti kwiepa kaneukaxiriyani[cite: 1126]. Kwie hairieka miemetsie xewiti kaniutatani kiyexite meta 'ixa mitsitsiirawi naiti katiniutitani[cite: 1127].

Hiki hutarieka mieme niuki tuayame yukuxineta kaniutahitsieni[cite: 1128]. Yemuri hepai tiyuxexeiyati 'aneti tati haramaratsie kaneukahiiyani [cite: 1128], haramara hairieka miemetsie xewiti xuriya kanayani[cite: 1128].
Haramaratsie memiteye'uwa hairieka miemetsie xewiti mekateniukwini [cite: 1129], yaxeikiata kanuwate 'amipapa hairieka miemetsie xewiti kaneuyehuiyani[cite: 1129].

Hiki hairieka mieme niuki tuayame yukuxineta kaniutahitsieni[cite: 1131]. Taheima 'akaneka xurawe 'aneti kwiepa kaniukaweni kixeme hepai tati[cite: 1131]. Hatuxame meta haixa mukunenieretsie hairieka miemetsie xewiti kaniukaweni[cite: 1132].
Xurawe Matsiwi katinitewakaitini[cite: 1133]. Haa hatsiwiti kanayani [cite: 1133], yumiireti teiteri mekaniukwini haa matsiirixiki[cite: 1133].

Hiki naurieka mieme niuki tuayame yukuxineta kaniutahitsieni[cite: 1135]. Tau hairieka miemetsie xewiti pikahekiariwiekai [cite: 1137], yaxeikiata metseri, meta xurawetsixi, kaniukuyire [cite: 1137], mipai hairieka miemetsie xewiti tukariki meta tikariki pika'uhekiakai[cite: 1137].

Hiki nekaneutaniere, kwixu nekaniu'enieni muyuawi hixiapa 'awiximeme [cite: 1138], karima mipai 'utaineme: <<Xia'ui, xia'ui, xia'ui keme'itiarieni kwiepa memitama [cite: 1138], kepauka niuki tuayamete 'imatiremete yuhaikati yukuxineta memitihitsienitsie»[cite: 1138].

Hiki 'auxiwirieka mieme niuki tuayame yukuxineta kaniutahitsieni[cite: 1140, 1141]. Xurawe nekaniuxeiya taheima mieme kwiepa 'ukaweku [cite: 1142, 1143], miwatixawatsie mieme yawiyari kaniukweitiarieni kimana mireuyepieniki meukatewatsie[cite: 1143].

Hiki katineuyepieni miwatixawatsie [cite: 1144], hiki meukatewatsie kwauni kanewatineni teka 'amipa kwauniyari hepai 'aneti [cite: 1144], tau kahekiakaku pukuyirixi [cite: 1144], ka'anuyehekiati patia kwauni miwatineikakaiki miwatixawatsie[cite: 1144].
Hiki kwaunitsata mehatinexiaka [cite: 1145], kwiepa mekaniwakine 'utsikari [cite: 1145], tirikariya mekaniupitiarieni terikaxi kwiepa miemete kememitetirikawi wahepai[cite: 1146, 1147].

Mipai mekateniutahiawarieni, 'atsimemika'iyurieniki kwiepa mieme 'ixa, naime mitsitsiirawi naime kiye [cite: 1149, 1150, 1151], matsi 'axamemiwayurieniki teiteri Kakaiyari tseyuya memikahexeiya yukanata[cite: 1152].

Mipai mekateniupitiarieni, memikawakwiniki [cite: 1155], matsi memiwa'uximatiakaki 'auxiwime metseri[cite: 1156]. Kememitewa'uximatiakai, yaxeikia mekaniyiakaitini kepauka tewi terika mikei hepai[cite: 1157].
Miki tukaritsie teiteri mepeukwikuni matsi mepiyutatexieni memikwiniki [cite: 1158], mepiyuwautiweni memikwiniki [cite: 1158], peru miya puyuta'una, wahetsie pumaweni[cite: 1158].

'Utsikari kememiteyuxexeiyakai, kawayutsixi memikuha'aritsie kuyaxa miemete wahepai mekani'anenekaitini[cite: 1159]. Yumu'utsie huru kurunayari hepai 'aneneme mekananamanakaitini [cite: 1159], meta yihixie teiteri kememitehaka'erie mipai mepiteyuxexeiyakai[cite: 1159].
'Ukarawetsixi wahepai mepite'ukipakai [cite: 1160], meta watamete mayetsi watamete hepai pi'anenekai[cite: 1160].
Tepia hepai 'aneneme mepanakatitikatei yutawitsie [cite: 1161], yu'anaki meputixuwarikakai [cite: 1161], kawayutsixi kuyaxa meheuyukwiyuka miki wahepai mepiteyu'eniiriukikai[cite: 1161].
Mekaniukwaxikaitini, terikaxi wakwaxi hepai kani'anenekaitini 'anuyemimitsiti [cite: 1162], meta yukwaxitsie tirikariya mekanexeiyakaitini, 'auxiwime metseri teiteri memiwa'uximatiakaki[cite: 1162].

Kemi'ane mitiwa'aitiakai niuki tuayame kanihikitikaitini [cite: 1163], mana mire'aitakai meukatewatsie [cite: 1163], hepirayutsixi waniukiki 'Awaruni katinitewakaitini [cite: 1163], meta kiriyekutsixi waniukiki Tiyuka'uname titewati[cite: 1163].
Kananuyeyaniri, xia'ui matiari mieme, peru 'akuxi hutati xia'ui kaneuyeweka[cite: 1164].

Hiki 'ataxewirieka mieme niuki tuayame yukuxineta kaniutahitsieni [cite: 1165, 1166], meta yuariya nekaniu'enieni mawari taiyame nauka 'awayari mexeiya huruki miwewiyata 'atineikame Kakaiyari hixie muwe[cite: 1169].
'Iki niuki tuayame kuxineta makwe'e mipai katinitahiawe: «Niuki tuayamete memuyunauka keniwarutixina hatuxame 'amipatsie 'Eupirate hatetsita memitihe»[cite: 1170].

Hiki niuki tuayamete memuyunauka memukuha'aritsiekai miki hurayari, miki tukari, miki metseri, miki wiyaritsie mekaniutixinarieni [cite: 1171], hairieka miemetsie xewiti teiteri memiwakwiniki[cite: 1171].
Wakuyaxima kawayutsixi wahetsie mematekai huta tsienituyari miyuniyari (200.000.000) mekaniyupaimekaitini[cite: 1172].

Hiki heinitsika hepai nepitiwaruxei, kawayutsixi meta memeutayaxiwawe [cite: 1173]: Yutawitsie tepia mekanenakatitikateitini mayetaimaiyetikatei, mayekwauniyatikatei, mayetataxawi 'atsupire hepai[cite: 1173]. Kawayutsixi wamu'u mayetsi wamu'u hepai kani'anenekaitini [cite: 1174], wateta tai kaniwayeneikakaitini, kwauni meta 'atsupire[cite: 1174].
Haika kwiniyayariki hairieka tsiemieme xewiti teiteri mekaniukwini [cite: 1175], taiki, kwauniki meta 'atsupireki wateta muwayeneikakaiki[cite: 1175].
Kawayutsixi yitirikariya mekanexeiyakaitini yuteta meta yukwaxitsie [cite: 1176], wakwaxi kuterixi wahepai kani'anenekaitini 'anutimu'utikaiti [cite: 1176], mikiki 'axamepiwayuriekai[cite: 1176].
Hipati teiteri memika'ukwi'iwaxi mewakwikaku [cite: 1177], miki mepikatehayewakai mete'ayexeiyati tita yumamaki memitewewie[cite: 1177].

Mepikatehayewakai meteyumemiwati, meteyukewaiyati, mikayi'iya meta mikayikina mewakumaiwati meta metenawayati[cite: 1182]. Mepikatehayewakai nenewieri mewapitiati kakaiyarixi 'axamemi'anene [cite: 1181], huru, pirata, wurunitse, tete, kiye kakaiyarixiyari tsepa memikaheuneniere, memikaheu'enana, meta memika'ukiniwawe[cite: 1181].

Hiki xeime niuki tuayame nekaniuxeiya tirikaiyeme taheima 'akamiekame, haiwitiri tsata yeweme[cite: 1185]. Kuwiwi mu'uya heima kaniuyekateitini [cite: 1186], yihixie tau hepai kanayexawatikaitini [cite: 1186], meta 'ikateya tai 'amanutitetere hepai pitiyuxexeiyakai[cite: 1187].
Yumamatsie xapa kanahuriekaitini 'etsiyeume werime[cite: 1188, 1189, 1190]. Yutserie yi'ikaki haramaratsie kaneutakeni, yu'utakita kwiepa[cite: 1191].
Hiki karima kaniutahiwa maye kemitiutahiwa hepai[cite: 1192]. 'Utaniuku, 'atahuta tiranariyari kaniuyuani[cite: 1192].

Kepauka muyua 'atahuta tiranariyari ne nepititi'utianikekai [cite: 1193], peru xeime nekaniu'enieni taheima mipai haineme: «Ketine'awietani 'atahuta tiranariyari, kememutiyua meta pepikaraka'utiwani»[cite: 1193, 1194].
Hiki miki niuki tuayame nemuxeiyakai haramaratsie heutaweme meta kwiepa, yutseriekita muyuawitsie paiti kaneutimeni[cite: 1195].

Kaniuyuhiritiani mayeniere hixie tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika [cite: 1196], kemi'ane muyuawi, kwie, haramara meta tita naiti mana mitixiawe [cite: 1200], meta mipai kaniutayini: «'Ari tukari kananayexini[cite: 1200].

Matsi kepauka 'atahutarieka mieme niuki tuayame mitaniuni, kepauka yukuxineta mitahitsieni [cite: 1201], 'ana tita Kakaiyari mitiuti'awietakai kanaye'amiki mitahekiatsieniki [cite: 1201], hetsiena yuniukamete mieme memite'uximayakai»[cite: 1202, 1203].

Hiki kemi'ane nemu'eniekai taheima 'utaniukame, miki tawarita pinetsi'utahiawixi mipai 'utaiti: «Huma kenemie, kenahuri 'iya xapa 'etsimiyewa muweri, niuki tuayame mehurie haramaratsie heutaweti meta kwiepa»[cite: 1204].

Hiki niuki tuayame hetsia nekaniuyani meta xapa mikwikwie nekanitawawirieni[cite: 1205]. Mikita mipai kanetiniutahiawe: <<Kenanuhuritsi meta keneutakwa'i[cite: 1205]. 'Ayuriepa patsiire, peru 'ateta xiete hepai pakakare»[cite: 1206].
Hiki xapa 'etsimiyewa ne'anuhurieka niuki tuayame mehuriekai, nekanitakwani[cite: 1207]. Neteta xiete hepai pakakarixi, kepauka nemitakwai [cite: 1207], peru neyuriepa hatsiwiti kanayani[cite: 1207].
Miki mipai pinetiutahiawixi: «Kaneuyeweka 'eki tawarita Kakaiyari hetsiemieme pemitiwataxatianiki miireme kiekarite, nuiwarite, yuniukiki memutiniuka meta te'aitamete wahepaitsita»[cite: 1208, 1209].

Merikitsi haka ti'ininiatame mihikitikai [cite: 1217, 1218], mipaita nekatiniutahiawarieni: «Kenanukukexi, Kakaiyari tukieya keneuti'iniata meta mawari taiyame [cite: 1219], yaxeikiata keyupaimeti muwa memeyutinenewiwa tukita keniwaruti'iniata[cite: 1219].

Tuki takwa keneuhayewa xeikia, pepika'iti'iniata [cite: 1220], mana memupitiarieki nuiwarite hipati [cite: 1221], miki mekaniketsikuni Kakaiyari kiekariena huta tewiyari heimana huta metseri[cite: 1221].

Neri yuhutame nekaniwarexeiyani tehekiatamete [cite: 1222], miki kememite'unenierixi mipai memitekuxataniki xeimiriyari heimana huta tsienituyari heimana haika tewiyari tukari [cite: 1222], hiwerika kamixayari me'anakatitikaiti»[cite: 1222].
Huriwa kiyeyari hutati [cite: 1223], kixeme hutati kwie kutsiyari hixie miti'u [cite: 1223], miki mekanihikitini[cite: 1223].

Xika xewiti tiwakwinitiamikini, miki tai yuteta mepiwayenenetiwa [cite: 1224], meta mepiwatixixitsitiwa miki memiwaraye'unie[cite: 1224]. Mipai katinimieriemiki kemi'ane mitiwakwinitiamikini[cite: 1224].

Miki tehekiatamete heitserie mekanexeiyani muyuawitsie mikakawiyeki mexi metekuxata [cite: 1225], heitserie meta mekanexeiyani haa hepaitsita, xuriya memayeitianiki [cite: 1225], memitewakwinitianiki kwiepa memitama naime kwiniyaki tsepa kepaimexia kemitiwanake[cite: 1225].
Kepauka meminini mipai metehekiatati [cite: 1226], yeutanaka meukatewatsie matine wara'iwamiti piwakwineni [cite: 1226], wara'iwame kaniwakwimiki[cite: 1226].

Wakaxarite kiekari hixiapa pitiheni kiekari 'amakuyewatsie[cite: 1227]. 'Iyari kemitimate 'iniariki, Tsuruma katinakutewaka, 'Ekipitu meta rakutewa miki kiekari [cite: 1227], mana Tati'aitiwame kuruxitsie kani- umierieni[cite: 1231].
Hipati kiekarite mukumane, nuiwari, hipame niukiteki memutiniuka meta naitsarie kiekari mukumane yunaiti mekanixeiyakuni wakaxari haika tukari heimana merie tuka[cite: 1232].

Mepikawapitiani wakaxari mikateukieniki[cite: 1233]. Kwiepa memitama mepiyutemamawieka wakaxarite mexeiyati [cite: 1234], 'imikieri mepiyutamikwani [cite: 1234], texaxatamete yuhutati memiwa'uximatiakaiki kwiepa memitama[cite: 1234].

Hiki haika tukari heimana merie tuka 'anukayaku 'iyari nieritiwame kaniwaruwiya Kakaiyari heiyeni'aku[cite: 1235]. Mekananuku'uni [cite: 1235], miki memiwaruxei kwinimieme mekateniutimamani[cite: 1235].

Hiki xeime mekaniu'enieni taheima 'utaniukame mipai tiwakihiaweme: «'Ena xekena- natikini»[cite: 1236]. Muyuawitsie mekananutikine haiwitiritsata [cite: 1236], miki memiwaraye'uniekai mewaxeiyakaku[cite: 1236].

'Ana kwitiwa kwie karima kaniutayuani[cite: 1237]. Kiekari tamamatatsie mieme xewiti kaneuku'une[cite: 1238]. 'Atahuta miriyari meyupaimeti teiteri mekaniukwini [cite: 1238], peru memuyuhayewaxi waikawameki memamati, Kakaiyari taheima makawe hepaitsita 'aixia mekatenikuxatakaitini[cite: 1238].
Kanaye'ani xia'ui hutarieka mieme[cite: 1239]. Hairieka miemeta kanehurani[cite: 1239].

Hiki 'atahutarieka mieme niuki tuayame yukuxineta kaniutahitsieni[cite: 1241]. Hiki karima mekanetiniukakaitini muyuawitsie mipai me'utiyuati: «Hikitsiari kwiepa memitama wahetsie katinanuyeyani, Kiritsitu pitari pitita'aita tahetsiemieme [cite: 1243, 1246, 1247, 1248], tsepa xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika»[cite: 1249].
Hiki 'ukirawetsixi xeitewiyari heimana nauka Kakaiyari 'uwenieya hixie mematekai, miki mekaniutihixima'uni [cite: 1249, 1250], Kakaiyari nenewieri mekaniupitiani [cite: 1250]

mipai me'utiyuati: «'Eki Ti'aitame Kakaiyari Naimekipemitirikaiye, kemi'ane 'amuyeika meta 'amuyeikakai [cite: 1251], pamipariyutsi tepimatsipitia [cite: 1252] tirikariya pemupitiarie [cite: 1253], meta pekanitsutiani peti'aitati[cite: 1254].

Nuiwarite mekaniha'akaitini [cite: 1255], peru 'ahaxia kanaye'ani pemitiwakwinitianiki [cite: 1257], tukari raye'a mikite pemiwatahiaweki [cite: 1258], wa'iwarika miemete te'uximayatamete [cite: 1259], pemiwaminiki 'ahetsia Kakaiyari memipatsie [cite: 1260, 1261, 1262], niukametemama [cite: 1264], Kakaiyari teiterimama memimatsi'ayemakaxe kepemititewaki [cite: 1263, 1266, 1267], tiri meta 'ukirawetsixi yunaiti [cite: 1268], meta kanaye'ani pemiwakwiniki kemi'ane kwie memitsewiximakai»[cite: 1269, 1270].

Merikitsi Kakaiyari tukieya kaneuyepiere muyuawitsie [cite: 1271], kakuni tiratuya mi'iniariyari kanimatsiikikaitini tukita yekaiti [cite: 1272, 1273], kaniwayemerikakaitini [cite: 1274], kaneyeyuanekaitini [cite: 1276], kaneyetirarikakaitini kwie kaniutayuani meta tee 'aneneti kaniukaxirieni[cite: 1277, 1278].

Merikitsi 'iniari matsiikiti kanayani muyuawitsie mariweti: 'Ukaratsi mana kaniuwekaitini tau kamixayari 'anakatiti metseritsie 'aweti [cite: 1284], meta yumu'utsie kuruna 'anamati tamamata heimana huta xurawetsixi me'anakutetikaime [cite: 1284]
meta 'ayehukati, kaniutahiwakaitini 'ikukuinekaku meta tiuka'eniwati[cite: 1286].

Xewitita kaniuyuhekiata 'iniari muyuawitsie: kuu 'atimariweti heuxetati 'atahuta mu'ute hexeiyati [cite: 1287], meta tamamata 'awate hexeiyati [cite: 1287], yaxeikiata yumu'utetsie 'atahuta kurunayari me'anamanatikaiti[cite: 1287].

Yukwaxiki kaniwaranakahapani xurawetsixi muyuawitsie hairiekatsie xeime, kwiepa kaniwareukaxirieni[cite: 1288]. Kepauka 'ukaratsi mitiniwerimekai [cite: 1289], kuu 'amitimariwe hixiena kaniuhuni nu'aya kwaimiti[cite: 1289].
Hiki 'ukitime kaniutiniweni, yunaime nuiwarite tiwa'aitiwame mayani [cite: 1290], tepia 'itsiyari mitikweni[cite: 1290]. Nu'aya panutiwitikie Kakaiyari 'uwenieya manuwetsie paiti[cite: 1290].
Hiki 'ukaratsi kaniuyuta'una makumawetsie paiti [cite: 1291], hakewa Kakaiyari meikuha'aritiiri mana me'iwiyariekaki xeimiriyari heimana huta tsienituyari heimana haika tewiyari tukari[cite: 1291].

'Ana kuyaxa kaniutaweni muyuawitsie [cite: 1292]: Miyeri meta niuki tuayamete yunaiti mekanitsutiani kuu 'amitimariwe memietiweti[cite: 1292]. Kuu 'amitimariwe kaniyumienekaitini [cite: 1293], meta niuki tuayametemama hepaina[cite: 1293].
peru mepiyutatexi, huyeri pumawekai muyuawitsie memitenakeniki[cite: 1294].

Hiki miki kuu 'amitimariwe mipai katinayeweiyarieni [cite: 1298], miki kuu matiari paiti mieme Kauyumarie mititewa meta Tsatanaxi [cite: 1298], mitiwa'iriwiya yunaime kwiepa memitama [cite: 1298], miki kananuyehiiyani mana [cite: 1298], kwiepa paiti kaneukahiiyani [cite: 1298], niuki tuayametemama 'utimanata mekaneukaxiriyani[cite: 1299].

Hiki xeime nekaniu'enieni mipai haineme karima: «Hikirixia wikweitsitiarika kanaye'ani [cite: 1300], kemititirikaiye meta kemiti'aita takakaiyari [cite: 1301], kanaye'ani Kiritsitu heitserie kemirexeiya hetsiana mieme[cite: 1301]. Kemi'ane miwaxaneta ta'iwamarixi [cite: 1302], miki kananuyehiiyani [cite: 1303], takakaiyari hixie miwaxanetakai tukariki meta tikariki[cite: 1304, 1305].
Mikiri mekane'iwa Muxa xuriyayaki [cite: 1306, 1307], meta memitekuxatakaiki meyuhekiatati [cite: 1308], yutukari memika'utikweriki tsepa memukwi'iwaxi[cite: 1309, 1310].

'Ayumieme xekeneyutemamawieka muyuawi [cite: 1311], meta xeme muyuawitsie xemetitei[cite: 1312]. Peru xia'ui kwiepa xemitama meta haramaratsie[cite: 1313]. Kauyumarie xehetsia kaneukahiiyani [cite: 1314] waikawa ha'ati mipai timaiti [cite: 1315], yapaimexia xeikia mipitiarieki»[cite: 1315].
Merikitsi kepauka kuu 'amitimariwe kwiepa paiti maukahiiya, 'ukaratsi kaniuweiyakaitini 'ukitime mutiniwekai[cite: 1316].

Hiki 'ukaratsi kaniupitiarieni ma'anatikaniki kwixu 'aminena hepai [cite: 1317], makumawetsie paiti manuwieniki yuhuyeripa [cite: 1317], mana kuu 'amitimariwe mika'ixeiyaki [cite: 1321], hakewa xeiwiyari miremikieka [cite: 1321], 'ariketa huta wiyari [cite: 1321], 'ariketa merie wiyari[cite: 1321].
Hiki kuu 'amitimariwe 'ukaratsi mikuweiyanekai hatuxame hepai pame haa kananatihayani 'ukaratsi manuhautsitianiki[cite: 1322].
Peru kwie 'ukaratsi kaniuparewiekaitini [cite: 1323], kaniwatixaware [cite: 1323], haa muwa kaneukayeurieni hatuxame kuu 'amitimariwe yuteta menatihaya[cite: 1323].

Hiki kuu 'amitimariwe kaniuyeha'ani 'ukaratsi hepaitsita [cite: 1324], kaneyani miyumieneniki [cite: 1324], hipame hetsiena memiyenunuiwa miwaraye'uniekaki [cite: 1324], miki yamemitekahu Kakaiyari kemiti'aita [cite: 1324], memiyuhekiata Ketsutsi hetsia memiemetetiti[cite: 1324].

Merikitsi mana ne'uweti haramara tetsita [cite: 1326], yeutanaka nekaniuxeiya haramaratsie 'anatiyeiximeme[cite: 1326]. Yeutari yuhutati[cite: 1327]. Tamamata 'awayari kanexeiyakaitini, meta 'atahuta mu'ute [cite: 1328], xexuime 'awatetsie kuruna kananamanakaitini[cite: 1328]. Xexuime mu'utetsie pira'utikatei Kakaiyari kemititsewixima[cite: 1328].

Miki yeutanaka nemuxei tiwe hepai katiniyuxexeiyakaitini [cite: 1329], hutse hepai re'ikati [cite: 1329], meta maye hepai reteniti[cite: 1329]. Hiki kuu 'amitimariwe yitirikariya kanipitiani [cite: 1330], heitserie kanipitiani miti'aitaniki 'uwenitsie 'akaiti hakewa kuu 'amitimariwe mire'aitakai [cite: 1330], meta heitserie waikawameki kanipitiani[cite: 1330].

Mu'uya xewiti mumierie hepai pitiyuxexeiyakai [cite: 1334, 1335], peru kemitiukwinixi 'aixia reu'erieti kanayani tsepa mimiximekai[cite: 1336, 1337]. Yunaiti kwiepa memitama mekani'iyarixiekaitini yeutanaka, me'ixeiyati hetsiena memitewiyakukai[cite: 1338, 1339, 1340, 1341, 1342, 1343, 1344].

Nenewieri kuu 'amitimariwe kanipitiakaitini [cite: 1345], yeutanaka tirikariya mipitiaki[cite: 1345]. Yeutanakata nenewieri mekanipitiakaitini mipai me'utiyuati: «¿Kepaiki miki yeutanaka hepai pi'ane, kepaiki piyiwe hamatiana miyumieneni?» [cite: 1345]

Hiki niuki kaniupitiarieni waikawa mitikuxataniki, mitsewiximakaki Kakaiyari hepaitsita 'axa'utaiti [cite: 1346], meta heitserie kaniupitiarieni huta tewiyari heimana huta metseri mipai mitiyurieneniki[cite: 1346].

Hiki kanitsutiani 'axa'utaiti Kakaiyari hepaitsita [cite: 1347], 'itsewiximati kemi'ane mihiki [cite: 1347], meta kiekariena [cite: 1347], yaxeikiata muyuawitsie memitexuawe watsewiximati kanitsutiani[cite: 1347].

Hiki mipaita katiniupitiarieni miyumieneniki Kakaiyari teiterimama miwaraye'uniekaki, meta miwara'iwaniki [cite: 1348], heitserie pupitiarie yunaime nuiwarite wahepaitsita [cite: 1348], naime kiekari mukumane, hipame niukiyariki memutiniuka, meta nuiwarite yunaime wahepaitsita[cite: 1348].

Yunaiti kwiepa memitama nenewieri mekanipitiakakuni [cite: 1349], miki xapatsie memika'aka'utiarie tukari memexeiyaniki [cite: 1349], Muxa mawari mayeitiarie xapayatsie [cite: 1349], kwie mutawewiyatsie paiti[cite: 1349].
Kemi'ane meu'ena, ke'u'ena[cite: 1350].

Kemi'ane teiteri 'ateewa paiti miwaranuhapani, mikita kananuhaniemiki 'ateewa paiti[cite: 1351]. Kemi'ane 'ixiparaki mitiyumemiwa, mikita 'ixiparaki kanimieriemiki[cite: 1355, 1356]. Mipai metemaiti Kakaiyari teiterimama mepite'uka'eniwani yuri mete'erieti[cite: 1356].
Kwitiwata xeime nekaniuxeiya yeutanaka kwieta matine[cite: 1357, 1358]. Hutame 'awate kana'uitiakaitini muxa hepai [cite: 1358], peru kuu 'amitimariwe hepai katiniuxaxatakaitini[cite: 1358].

Yeutanaka matiari miyianekai heitserie kemirexeiyakai [cite: 1359], 'iki naimeki yaxeikia katiniyurieneni hixiena 'uweti [cite: 1359], kanikuyuitiani kwie [cite: 1359], miki kwiepa memitamata kaniwarukuyuitiani nenewieri memipitianiki miki yeutanaka matiari mieme mihikitikai [cite: 1359], kemi'ane 'aixia reu'erieti mayeitiarie miximeti[cite: 1359].
'Iniari piwewie mamariwaweme [cite: 1360], tai pitita'aitiani taheima makaneniki kwiepa teiteri me'ixeiyakaku[cite: 1360].

Kwiepa memitama katiniwa'iriwiyani miiremeki 'iniari tiyurieneti [cite: 1361], yeutanaka hixie 'uweti[cite: 1361]. Mipai katiniwaruta'aitiani kwiepa memitama 'ikiya memitawewieniki yeutanaka hepai tiyuxexeiyame [cite: 1362], kemi'ane manutanierixi tsepa 'ixiparaki mitiukwinixi [cite: 1362], miki hepai 'anekame[cite: 1362].

Hiki mipai katiniupitiarieni 'iyari mipitianiki yeutanaka 'ikiyari [cite: 1363], miki mitikuxataniki [cite: 1363], mipai miti'aitaniki memikwi'iwaki keyupaimeti nenewieri memika'ipitia yeutanaka 'ikiyari[cite: 1363].

Hiki mipai katiniwaruta'aitiani tiri meta 'ukirawetsixi yunaime, xikutsixi meta tixaiti memikatehexeiya, memixixini meta wairiyarika memite'uximaya yunaime [cite: 1364], miki yunaiti yumamatsie yutserieta mekaniu'iniaritiarieni meta yukanata[cite: 1368].
Tewi pikayiweni tixaiti mitinaneniki meta mitituaniki xika ka'iniaritiarieka, xika yeutanaka kaha'utiaka kemititewa [cite: 1369], kemiti'iniatsie teriwarikaya 'iniariyari[cite: 1369].

'Ikiki yapiretimani, kemi'ane mitimaiwe ke'iti'iniata yeutanaka 'iniarieya [cite: 1370], tewi mipai paimemeki mi'iniariki, 'ataxewime tsienituyari heimana haika tewiyari heimana 'ataxewi (666) kanipaimeni[cite: 1370].

Merikitsi manata nekaneutaniere, Muxa nekaniuxeiya, Tsiyuni yemuriyaritsie kanawekaitini[cite: 1373]. Hamatiana mana mekaniti'ukaitini xeitsienituyari heimana huta tewiyari heimana nauka miriyari meyupaimeti [cite: 1374], yukanata mete'a'utikaiti Muxa kemititewa meta 'Ukiyarieya[cite: 1374].

Yuariya nekaniu'enieni muyuawitsie 'akaneikame, haa mariweti kemiti'eniiriiki, tiranari mitirikaiye hepai ti'eniiriikime[cite: 1376, 1377, 1378]. Yuariya nemu'eni, kanariwiwamete wakwikari kanihikitikaitini[cite: 1378].

Kwikari mihekwa mekanikwikakaitini 'uweni hixie meti'uti, yunaukati memayeneniere wahixie, meta 'ukirawetsixi wahixie[cite: 1380]. Xewiti pikayiwekai meitimaniki miki kwikari [cite: 1381], miki xeitsienituyari heimana huta tewiyari heimana nauka miriyari memiyupaimekai xeikia mepimaikai [cite: 1381], keyupaimeti memutixinarie me'utinanaiyaka kwiepa memitama watsata[cite: 1385].

Miki mekanihikitini memikayutsewixima, 'ukarawetsixi memikawarukumayia[cite: 1386]. Muxa 'utima memuku'uwa tsepa hakewa meutia[cite: 1386]. Miki teiteri memutinanaiya mexiakame 'ikwaxi hepai [cite: 1387], Kakaiyari meta Muxa nuiwarieya memakineki[cite: 1387].
Wateta 'itarika pumawekai, pikarahiiwakai[cite: 1387].

Hiki xeimeta nekaniuxeiya niuki tuayame muyuawi hixiapa 'awiximeme [cite: 1390], meta niuki 'aixia manuyine yuheyemeki miwataxatianiki kwiepa memitama [cite: 1390], naitsarie kiekatari, tsepa kehate, kememite'uniukakai, meta kiekari mukumane[cite: 1390].

Kaniutahiwakaitini karima: «Kakaiyari xekenayemakaxeni, meta 'aixia xekeneutiyuaneni hepaitsitana [cite: 1391], 'ari kanaye'ani miwatahiaweki 'itsikametiti[cite: 1391]. Xekenayexeiyani naime mitiutiwewi muyuawi, kwie, haramara meta haixate»[cite: 1392].

Kaniweiyakaitinita hutarieka mieme niuki tuayame mipai tiuhiwati: «'Ari kaniuka'une[cite: 1393]. Wawiruniya mimariwe 'ari kaniuka'une [cite: 1393], yunaime nuiwarite winu miwa'itiakai memikumaiwaniki»[cite: 1393].

Manata hairieka mieme niuki tuayame wa'utima kaniumiekaitini karima 'utahiwati: <<Xika xewiti yeutanaka 'ayexeiyani meta 'ikiyari [cite: 1394], meta tseyuya yukanata meta yumamatsie mutanaki'erieni[cite: 1394],

yaxeikiata Kakaiyari haxiaya winuyari mekananu'ikuni tekixieyata muyema hikiati tixaiti katinuitiarieti[cite: 1395]. Kani'uximatiariemiki taiki, meta 'atsupireki, niuki tuayamete memipatsie wahixie meta Muxa hixie[cite: 1399].

'Uximatiarika kitsiyari panutineikani tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika[cite: 1400]. 'Uxipiya mepikahexeiyani tukariki tikariki keyupaimeti yeutanaka memayexeiya meta 'ikiyari [cite: 1400], 'iniarieya memutanaki'eri kemititewa»[cite: 1400].
Mipai metemaiti Kakaiyari teiterimama mepite'uka'eniwani [cite: 1401], miki yamemitekahu Kakaiyari kemiti'aita meta yuri memite'erie Ketsutsi hetsie[cite: 1401].

Hiki xeime muyuawitsie hetaniukame nekaniu'enieni: «Ketinaka'utia [cite: 1402, 1403]: 'Aixia mekani'itiariekakuni miki Ti'aitame hetsie metewiyati memikwini 'ena mitiyeyani»[cite: 1404]. «Huu -'Iyari kanaineni- [cite: 1405], mekani'uxipiekakuni [cite: 1406] miki kememite'u'uximayakai [cite: 1409], tita memite'uyuri pimatsiikini tsepa hakewa meme'uwani»[cite: 1410].

Hiki nekaneutaniere, 'ana haiwitiri tuxame nekaniuxeiya [cite: 1412], miki hetsie xewiti kanakateitini <<Yuri Tewi hepai tiyuxexeiyati»[cite: 1412]. Yumu'utsie huru kurunayari 'anamati [cite: 1413], meta yumamatsie kutsira makatutsi 'atamiariekame 'akweti[cite: 1413].

Hiki xewitita niuki tuayame tukita 'ayeneka [cite: 1414], haiwitiri hetsie makatei kaniutahiwieni: «Kutsira makatutsiki keneukaxiteki[cite: 1414]. 'Ari kanaye'ani mika'iniiyaniki [cite: 1414], 'aixiari kani'aneneni»[cite: 1414].
Hiki haiwitiri hetsie makatei kutsira makatutsiki katinakuxiteni [cite: 1416], kwiepa naiti katiniuka'itsanarieni[cite: 1416].
Hiki xewitita niuki tuayame muyuawitsie tukita kaniwayeneni [cite: 1417], mikita kutsira makatutsi 'ataxikaunime kanakwekaitini[cite: 1420].

Xewitita mawari taiyame hetsie kanayeneni niuki tuayame heitserie mexeiyakai tai hepaitsita [cite: 1421], meta kutsira makatutsi 'ataxikaunime makwe'e karima kaniutahiwieni: «'Akutsira mataxikauniki kaxie takariyari kwiepa keneukuxeiri, 'ari 'aixia kani'aneneni»[cite: 1421].
Hiki miki niuki tuayame yukutsiraki kwiepa kanikuxeirieni [cite: 1422], kaxie 'ukuxeirieka meta 'ipiname 'amiyewata kaneikaxirieni [cite: 1422], Kakaiyari haxiayata[cite: 1422].

Hiki kaxie takariyari kiekari warie paiti kaniutiketsinarieni [cite: 1423], meta kaxie pinameta xuriya kaniwayeneikakaitini [cite: 1423], kawayutsixi wapirenu hetsie kaniye'ani [cite: 1423], haika tsienituyari kirumetiruyari 'akuyeukaku[cite: 1423].

Xeime tawarita 'iniari mariweme nekaniuxeiya muyuawitsie tiyihixiyatsitiwame [cite: 1426]: 'atahuta niuki tuayamete nekaniwaruxeiya 'atahuta kwiniyayari memexeiyakai 'imatirieka miemete [cite: 1426], mikiki Kakaiyari haxiaya memaye'atianiki[cite: 1426].

Yaxeikiata haramara xikiri mutitatawe hepai 'anekame nekaniuxeiya[cite: 1427]. Miki meta nepiwaruxei haramara tetsita me'uti'ukame yeutanaka mema'iwaxi, 'ikiyari meta 'iniariyari kemititewa[cite: 1427]. Haripa mekaniu'ikaiti Kakaiyari miwayetuiriekai[cite: 1428],

meta Muitsexi niawarieya mekwikati Kakaiyari ti'uximayatsiriwame [cite: 1433, 1434], meta Muxa niawarieya [cite: 1435, 1436]: <<Pepimariwe meta pitiyuhixiyatsitiwa [cite: 1437, 1438, 1439], 'a'uximayatsika Ti'aitame, Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye[cite: 1440, 1441]. Heitseriemeki meta 'ahuye kaniyuritini [cite: 1442], nuiwarite Tiwa'aitiwame[cite: 1443].

Kamitsi Ti'aitame, mekamenayemakaxekakuni[cite: 1444]. Kamitsi 'aixia petikuxaxatsiwame mekamenayeitiakakuni[cite: 1445]. 'Eki xeikia pekanipatsieka[cite: 1446]. Yunaiti nuiwarite mekani'axiakuni [cite: 1447], nenewieri memetsipitianike 'a'uximayatsika heitseriemeki mihekiaki»[cite: 1448, 1449, 1450].
Miya tiuyiku mipaita nekatiniuniere [cite: 1451], muyuawitsie tuki muwe kaneuyepiere [cite: 1452], hakewa Kakaiyari mehekiatsie[cite: 1452].

Muwa tukita mekanayenexiani niuki tuayamete 'atahutati memi'atia 'atahuta kwiniyayari[cite: 1453]. Rinu 'ixurikiyari mi'itiya mepanakatitikatei xawatimeki [cite: 1453], meta huru hiiyameyariki yutawitsie mepayuhiatikatei[cite: 1453].

Hiki yunaukati memayeneniere, xewiti miki kaniwarutahapatiani niuki tuayamete xexuime huru kupayari Kakaiyari haxiaya hipineme [cite: 1454], yuheyemeki mayeniere tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika[cite: 1454].

Hiki tukita kitsi kaniuyehine [cite: 1455], Kakaiyari xawatiriyaya meta kemititirikaiye [cite: 1456, 1457], xewiti pikayiwekai tukita meutahaniki kepaukake meutipare 'atahuta kwiniyayari, 'atahutati niuki tuayamete memi'atia[cite: 1458, 1463].
Merikitsi xeime nekaniu'enieni tukita paiti karima warahiwiwame niuki tuayamete: «Mana xekenehu, meta kwiepa xekeneukayeuri 'atahuta tekixiyari Kakaiyari haxiaya mihipine»[cite: 1466].

Hiki mexiakame kaneyani [cite: 1467], kwiepa yutekixi kaneukayeurieni [cite: 1467], meta yunaiti teiteri yeutanaka 'iniarieya memexeiyakai meta 'ikiyari memayex- eiyakai miki kwinimieme 'axa'anemeki mekaniuti'etsata meta 'axame'uki'iareti[cite: 1467].
Hiki hutarieka mieme yutekixi haramaratsie kaneukayeurieni [cite: 1468], xuriya kanayani mikite waxuriya hepai 'aneti [cite: 1468], yunaiti mekateniukwini haramaratsie memuteye'uwakai[cite: 1468].
Hiki hairieka mieme hatuxametetsie meta haixatetsie yutekixi kaneukayeurieni [cite: 1469], mikita xuriya kanayani[cite: 1469].

Hiki niuki tuayame haaki mihiritiarie nekani- u'enieni mipai 'utaineme [cite: 1470]: <<'Eki heitserie pekanexeiyani [cite: 1471], Pemipatsie, pemihiki meta yuheyemeki 'ape- miya 'anekameki pepitiwarakapitiwa[cite: 1472, 1475].

Miki 'ateiterima meta 'aniukamete waxuriya memutayeuri [cite: 1473, 1476], 'ekita xuriya miyamemite'uyuriki pepiwaranu'itia [cite: 1477, 1478, 1479, 1480], mikiki pepitiwarakapitia»[cite: 1481, 1482].

Xeimeta nekaniu'enieni mawari taiyame mipai 'utaineme [cite: 1486]: <<Mipai pi'ane, Ti'aitame Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye [cite: 1487, 1488, 1489, 1490], yuriki pehaiti meta heitseriemeki yapetikamieti pepiti'amari'itiwa»[cite: 1491, 1492].
Hiki naurieka mieme niuki tuayame yutekixi tau hetsie kaneikayeurieni [cite: 1493], tau mipai katiniupitiarieni teiteri taiki miwatixitsitiwaniki[cite: 1493].

Yunaiti teiteri mekaniti'iwarikirekaitini [cite: 1494], peru miyatiti mepikate'uhayewaxi [cite: 1494], Kakaiyari hepaitsita 'aixia memaitikaniyari [cite: 1494], heitserie mexeiyakaiki mipai mitiwakwinitianiki [cite: 1494], kemititewa hepaitsitana 'axameputiyua[cite: 1494].

Hiki 'auxiwirieka mieme niuki tuayame yutekixi yeutanaka 'uwenieya hetsie kaneikayeurieni [cite: 1495], naitsarie mira'aitakaitsie kanakuyire[cite: 1495]. Teiterimama yuneni mekanikukewekaitini kukuiniyaki[cite: 1497],
meta mete'ukakukuineti haiyaki Kakaiyari muyuawitsie makawe hepaitsitana 'axameputiyuanekai [cite: 1498], mepikatehayewakai 'axameteyurieti[cite: 1500].

Hiki 'ataxewi mieme yukupa hatuxame 'amipatsie 'Eupirate mititewatsie kaneikayeurieni [cite: 1501, 1502], haa mana kanakawani manutayepiereki te'aitamete mana memukineki tau manatineika kiekatari[cite: 1502].

Hiki kuu 'amipa tetana nekatiniuxeiya [cite: 1503], meta yeutanaka teta [cite: 1503], meta tixaxatame miti'itawa teta [cite: 1503], nekatiniuxeiya haikame 'iyarite mika'itiyatika [cite: 1503], temutsi wahepai meteyuxexeiyame[cite: 1503].

Miki 'iyarite 'axami'anene kanihikitini [cite: 1507], 'iniari mamariweme memiteyurie [cite: 1507], meta mekanayekikani yunaime kwiepa te'aitamete wahetsia [cite: 1508], memiyutakwiniki Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye mariwemeki tukarieya maye'anitsie[cite: 1509, 1510, 1512].

<<Neuxei yumarima, tinawayame hepai nekaninuamiki[cite: 1513]. 'Aixia pi'itiarieni kemi'ane miyihitia [cite: 1513], miha'aritsie yu'ixuriki mikawaune [cite: 1513], kapa maweti 'uyeikaniki meta yutewiyati»[cite: 1513].
Hiki 'iyarite 'axamemi'anene te'aitamete mekaniwarukuxeirieni [cite: 1514], hepirayuki 'Arimakeruni mirakutewatsie[cite: 1514].
Hiki 'atahutarieka mieme yutekixi 'ekapa kaneukayeurieni [cite: 1515], meta tukita 'uweni manuwe yuariya karima kanayeneni mipai 'utaiti: «'Ari kaneutipare»[cite: 1515].

Meta katiniukamimiwakaitini [cite: 1516], karima 'utatirarikati [cite: 1516], meta kwie karima kaniutayuani[cite: 1516]. Hatsuaku kemikatitayuawekai tewi kwiepa mutawewiyatsie paititi [cite: 1516], kwinimieme tiutayuati mariwemeki kanayani[cite: 1516].

Hiki kiekari mimariwe kaniutaxine haikati kanayani [cite: 1517], meta nuiwarite wakiekarite kaniuka'unixiani[cite: 1517]. Kakaiyari Wawiruniya kiekariyari mimariwe kanaye'erieni [cite: 1518], meta yutekixita yuhaxia hineme kaniwaru'itiani memi'uximatiarieniki[cite: 1518].
Hiki naiti kwie haramara hixiapa miyemane [cite: 1519], meta hirite kaniukumawerixiani[cite: 1519].

Muyuawitsie tee 'aneneti kanakanexiani teiteri wahetsie kaniukaxirieni [cite: 1520], huta tewiyari kiruyari raheteti[cite: 1520]. Meta teiteri Kakaiyari hepaitsitana 'axamekaniutiyuanekaitini [cite: 1524], mariwemeki mitiwakwinitiakaiki[cite: 1524].

Merikitsi miki xewiti niuki tuayamete 'atahuta memihiki tekixi memuhapakai [cite: 1528], 'ahurawa kanayani [cite: 1528], mipai kanetiniutahiawe: «Kenaye'a, nepimatsixeitsitiani 'ukaratsi mimariwe kemitikwine tuminiki miyumayiinia [cite: 1528], haa waikawame hetsie 'akaiti[cite: 1528].
Miki mekanikumaiwakaitini kwiepa te'aitamete [cite: 1529], meta teiteri mana memitamakai winuki mekanitariwetiwekaitini [cite: 1529], memikumayianiki»[cite: 1529].

Hiki niuki tuayame 'Iyari nehetsie nuaku kanenewitini makumawetsie paiti[cite: 1530]. Mana 'ukaratsi nekaniuxeiya yeutanaka meuyitsikimaiyetsie 'akaime[cite: 1530]. Yeutanaka naitsarie hetsiena pira'utikatei 'axa'aniyinemeki Kakaiyari hepaitsita [cite: 1531], 'atahuta mu'ute pexeiyakai [cite: 1531], meta tamamata 'awate[cite: 1531].

'Ukaratsi miyitsikimaiyeki meta mixetaki puyukemaritiakai [cite: 1532], huru heukatekame [cite: 1534], tetexi witsimi'anene meta periraki[cite: 1533]. Huru tekixiyari pahanakai mitixani'eriwa meta kemitikumayiiwakai tihineme[cite: 1533].
Yukanata pira'utiakai kayumainiakameki [cite: 1535]: WAWIRUNIYA MİMARIWE [cite: 1536], TUMINIKI MEMUYUMAYİİNİA WAMAAMA [cite: 1537], META AXAMITI'ANE MITIXANI ERIWA KWIEPA[cite: 1537].

Hiki miki 'ukaratsi nekaniuxeiya tawekame Kakaiyari teiterimama waxuriyaki [cite: 1541], meta miki memiyuhekiatakai Ketsutsi hetsia memiemetetiti waxuriyaki[cite: 1541, 1542]. Hiki ne'ixeiyati kwinimieme nekanihixiyakaitini[cite: 1544, 1546].

Hiki niuki tuayame mipai kanetiniutahiawe: «¿Ketitayari petihixiya? Nepimetsitahekiatiani 'ukaratsi hepaitsita meta yeutanaka 'atahuta mu'ute mexeiya meta tamamata 'awate mexeiya hepaitsita[cite: 1547, 1548].

Miki yeutanaka pemixeiya, miki meripaiti kaniuyeikakaitini, hikiri pika'uyeika, meukatewata kanewatiyeiximeni, peru mamierienitsie kaniu'erieka[cite: 1549]. Kwiepa memitama keyupaimeti memika'aka'utuarie kwie munetiarietsie paiti xapatsie tukari memexeiya manuyinetsie [cite: 1550], miki mekanihixiyakuni yeutanaka mexeiyati [cite: 1550], meripaiti 'amuyeikakai, hikiri 'amika'uyeika, matsita kaninuamiki[cite: 1550].
>>'Ena kaneuyeweka meiti'enietiyani meta meitimaitiyani[cite: 1551]. 'Atahuta mu'ute, miki 'atahuta yemurite kanihikitini 'ukaratsi hetsiena maka[cite: 1551].

Yaxeikiata 'atahuta te'aitamete 'atahuta- tati mekanihikitini [cite: 1552]: Yu'auxiwiti 'ari mekaniukwini [cite: 1552], xewiti katini'aitani [cite: 1552], meta xewiti 'akuxi pikanuawe [cite: 1552], peru kepauka munuani yapaumexia xeikia kaniuyeikamiki[cite: 1552].
Miki yeutanaka meripaiti 'amuyeikakai matsi pikahikiri, miki ti'aitame 'atahairieka mieme kanihikitini[cite: 1553]. 'Atahutati wahetsia kanimiemetini, mikita kaniyemieni mamierienitsie[cite: 1553].

>>Tamamata 'awate pemuxei, miki tamamata te'aitamete mekanihikitini [cite: 1554, 1555], memika'itsutiawawe 'akuxi mete'aitati [cite: 1558], peru kwitiwa heitserie mekanipitiariekuni memiteta'aitaki yeutanaka hamatia[cite: 1558].
Miki yaxeikia mekateniku'eriwakuni [cite: 1559], yitirikariya mekaniyetuiriekuni yeutanaka watirikariya mexeiyaniki[cite: 1559].

Miki Muxa mekanitamiekuni [cite: 1560], peru Muxa kaniwara'iwamiki kutsiyarite miwakutsiyariki meta te'aitamete mitiwa'aitiwameki [cite: 1560], meta miki hamatiana memu'uwa meputa'inierie, mepanayexeiyarie yamemitekahu»[cite: 1561].

Hikita niuki tuayame mipai kanetiniutahiawe: «Haa pemuxeiyakai, 'ukaratsi tuminiki muyumayiinia hetsiena 'akaime [cite: 1562], miki kiekarite mekanihikitini, mimiiremete memihiki meta hipame niukiteki memutiniuka[cite: 1562].

Tamamata 'awate pemuxei, meta yeutanaka, miki 'ukaratsi tuminiki miyumayiinia mekanitixani'erikuni[cite: 1563]. Yuxaitame mekaniku'eirikuni meta heumaweme [cite: 1563], waiyarieya mekanitakwaikuni [cite: 1563], meta mekanitataiyakuni[cite: 1563].

Kakaiyari mipai pitiwa'iyaritiani mipai memiteyuriekaki miki pita kemitiyuriemiki wa'iyari yuxewikaku me'ipitiakaku yeutanaka miki pita miti'aitametiniki wahetsiemieme [cite: 1564], mipai meteyurieyu katinaye'atiariemiki naiti Kakaiyari kemutayi[cite: 1564].
'Ukaratsi pemuxei, miki kiekari mimariwe kani'iniariyaritini mitirikaiye miti'aitaniki kwiepa te'aitamete wahetsia»[cite: 1565].
Merikitsi xeimeta niuki tuayame nekaniuxeiya muyuawitsie 'akamiekame[cite: 1571, 1572]. Waikawa tirikariya hexeiyati [cite: 1572], meta kwiepa yuhekiariyaki kaniuhekiariwieni[cite: 1572].

Hiki karima kaniutahiwa mipai 'utaiti: <<Kaniuka'une[cite: 1574]. Kaniuka'une Wawiruniya mimariwe[cite: 1575, 1576]. Kakaiyarixi 'axamemi'anene wakie kanayani [cite: 1578, 1579], meta yunaiti 'iyarite 'axami'anene waterita kanayani [cite: 1580, 1581], yunaiti wikixi memika'itiyatika wa'itua kanayani [cite: 1582], meta 'aixia mikatixeiyarie[cite: 1583].

Yunaiti nuiwarite memuti'iki memikumaiwaniki kawa'iyatikaku [cite: 1584, 1585], mana kiekari te'aitamete yunaiti miki mekanikumaiwakaitini [cite: 1586, 1587], meta tetuayamete mana kiekari [cite: 1588], xikutsixi mekanakine muyupitiakaiki witsi'aneme 'anayuhayewameki»[cite: 1589, 1590, 1592].

Hiki xeimeta nekaniu'enieni muyuawitsie mipai hetaineme: <<Kiekaritsie xekenewayekini neteiterima [cite: 1595], wahepai xemikayiakaki miki 'axakememiteyurie [cite: 1597, 1598, 1599], 'uximatiarika xehetsie mikatinakeniki [cite: 1600], tita 'axamemite'uyuri muyuawitsie paiti [cite: 1601, 1602], kaniukuxeiriyani [cite: 1603], meta Kakaiyari pikahetimai heitseriemeki kememikate'uyuri[cite: 1604, 1605].

Tuminieyaki xeketenakapitia [cite: 1606], tawarita matsi hepaina paimemeki ke'axamitiuyuriki [cite: 1608, 1611, 1612], meta tekixita yuwinu hakewa meikatu'akai [cite: 1613], tawarita hepaina paimeme xekeneukawewiri[cite: 1614, 1616, 1617].

Mariweti kemirayuyeitiakai [cite: 1619] meta witsimitikuhiawariwaniki [cite: 1620, 1621], yaxeikiata 'uximatiarika heiwerika xekenepitiaka[cite: 1623, 1624, 1625]. Yu'iyaritsie mipai paine: "Ena nepaka neti'aitati [cite: 1626, 1627], wiura nepikahiki [cite: 1628], hatsuaku nepikatikwine"[cite: 1628].

'Ayumieme kwiniya xeitukaritsie hetsiena kaninuamiki [cite: 1629]: miyaki, kwiniyaki meta hakaki pipitiarieni[cite: 1631]. Taiki kanitataiyariemiki [cite: 1632], kanitirikaiyeni kemi'ane mitamari'itiani Ti'aitame Kakaiyarititi»[cite: 1633, 1634, 1635].

Kepauka kwiepa te'aitamete memikumaiwakai kawa'iyatikaku meta witsiti'aneme memite'iyetuiriwakai [cite: 1636, 1637, 1638, 1639], miki mekaniutitsuanakuni me'ixeiyati kwauni 'atineikame tai 'itaxitsitiaximekaku[cite: 1639].

Waikawa memamati kemitikwinitiariekai [cite: 1640], 'ateewa paiti mekaniti'uikuni meta mipai mekatenihiwakuni: <<Xia'ui, xia'ui, kiekari mimariwe [cite: 1641], Wawiruniya, kiekari mitirikaiye [cite: 1642], xeihurayaritsie 'a'uximatiarika munuaki»[cite: 1643].
Tetuayamete kwiepa memitama mekaniutitsuanakuni meta mehe'eriwati mepuyuhiwerieka [cite: 1645], mipai metemaiti, xewiti tawariri mikatiwananairienikekaiki[cite: 1645]:

huru, pirata, tete witsimi'anene, meta perira, rinu 'ixurikiyari, 'ixuriki miyitsikimaiye, tsera 'ixurikiyari, meta 'ixuriki mixeta, naime kiye witsimu'ia, naiti mutiwewiya herepanite tameyariki, naiti mutiwewiya kiye witsimi'anene, wurunitse tepiayari, tepia mimerikawi, meta marimuri teteyari[cite: 1649],

kanera witsimu'iatika, witsimitiu'iatika, 'ikwa witsimu'ia, mixaxi, meta witsimu'ia, winu meta hatseiti, harina 'aixia mi'ane meta tiriku, wakait- sixi meta muxatsi, kawayutsixi meta kaxetate metatsiere teiteri, wairiyarika te'uximayatamete[cite: 1650].

Meta mipai mepite'ikuhiaweni: <<Tita pemitiheiwe'eriekai naimeki 'a'iyaritsie, 'ahetsia kaniumaweniri[cite: 1651]. Naimeri pekatineuyehiani 'apiinite miraye'atika meta witsimiti'anene, meta hatsuakuri pepikatikaxeiya»[cite: 1651].

Tetuayamete miyati'aneneme memitetuakai [cite: 1652], miki xikutsixi memayuyeitiakai kimana [cite: 1652], yunaiti 'ateewa paiti mekaniti'uikuni [cite: 1652], waikawa memamati kemitikwinitiarieka[cite: 1652]. Mekaniutitsuanakuni meta meyuheiwerieti [cite: 1652]

mipai me'utiyuati: <<Xia'ui, xia'ui, pumaweri kiekari mimariwe[cite: 1653, 1654]. Rinu 'ixurikiyari witsimi'anene, miyitsikimaiye meta mixeta manakatikikai [cite: 1655, 1656], meta huruki, tetexi witsimi'anene meta perira kaneukayatsakaitini[cite: 1656].
Xeihurayaritsie katiniukumawere naiti 'apiinite miraye'atika»[cite: 1657].

Yunaiti kanuwa 'amipa ni'awamete, 'ateewa kikamete, kanuwa wekemete, keyupaimeti haramaratsie memite'iwakai [cite: 1658], miki meta 'ateewa paiti mekaniyuhayewakuni[cite: 1662]. Tai kitsiyari mexeiyati taiyariekaku [cite: 1663], mipai mekateniuhiwakaitini: <<¿Pumawekai kiekari hepaina 'aneti, 'iki kiekari kemitimariwekai hepai?>>> [cite: 1664]

Tumuanari yumu'utsie mekaneutiwiwiwakaitini me'utitsuati meta meyuheiwerieti mekaniutihiwakuni: <<Xia'ui, xia'ui, kiekari mimariwekai[cite: 1665, 1666]. Mana xikutsixi memayuyeitia yunaiti kanuwa 'amipapa wakutsiyarima [cite: 1667], miki xeihurayaritsie katiniukumaweriyarieni[cite: 1667]. 20 Kene'atemawieka muyuawi, miyamitiuyiki[cite: 1668]. Xekeneyutemamawieka xemeta Kakaiyari teiterimama, ni'ariekate [cite: 1668, 1669], niukametemama[cite: 1669]. Kakaiyari miyetuaki Kakaiyari xeme pita heitserie xemexeiyaniki»[cite: 1670, 1672].

Hiki niuki tuayame mitirikaiye tete murinayari xikiraiyeme kananuku'ini [cite: 1672], haramaratsie kaneikahiani mipai 'utaiti [cite: 1672]: Yaxeikiata 'eki, Wawiruniya, kiekari mimariwe, pekatinikwinitiariemiki [cite: 1673, 1674], meta mipai pekatinakumaweriyariemiki 'ena kwiepa[cite: 1675, 1676].

Hatsuakuri kanariwiwamete haripaki, kirautaki meta kuxinetaki mepika'enierieni 'ahetsie[cite: 1677, 1678, 1679]. Hatsuakuri tewewiwamete 'ahetsia mepikaxuaweni[cite: 1680, 1681, 1682, 1683]. Hatsuakuri tixime mixikiraiye pika'enierieni 'ahetsia[cite: 1684, 1685].

Hatsuaku kixeme 'ahetsia pikahekiariwieni[cite: 1686]. Hatsuaku pika'enierieni neneikeme meta wikiwame watemawierika 'ahetsie[cite: 1690, 1691, 1692]. 'Ahetsia kiekatari memitetuakai kwiepa memitama mekanihikitikaitini[cite: 1693, 1694, 1695, 1696]. Pewakewaiyati kepemitiwa'itaiyakai yunaime nuiwarite wa'itsikate[cite: 1697, 1698, 1699].
'Ahetsie Kakaiyari niukametemama meta Kakaiyari teiterimama pemutayeuriki [cite: 1700, 1701, 1702, 1703], waxuriya meta yunaiti kwiepa memukwi'iwaxi»[cite: 1704, 1705].

Merikitsi manata muyuawitsie yuariya nekaniu'enieni yumiireme teiteri waniuki hepai ti'eniiriikime[cite: 1707, 1708]. Mipai me'utiyuati: «Kakaiyari hepaitsita 'aixia xekeneutiyuaneni[cite: 1709]. Wikweitsitiarikaya [cite: 1710], witsikemitikuxaxatsiwa meta tirikariyaya pihetsiemieme [cite: 1711, 1712, 1713], takakaiyari[cite: 1714].

kemitiyuheitseritiwa kaniyuritini meta 'aixia ketiniuka'iyarini[cite: 1715, 1716]. 'Ukaratsi tuminiki muyumayiinia mimatiwa kaniutaxaneta [cite: 1717, 1718], kayukinama wamayianeti kwie 'axa'anekame payeitia[cite: 1719, 1720]. Kakaiyari te'uximayatsiriwamete waxuriya metayeuriki»[cite: 1721, 1722, 1723, 1724].
Hiki hutarieka mipai mekaniutiyuani: «Kakaiyari hepaitsita 'aixia xekeneutiyuaneni[cite: 1725, 1726]. Miki kitsiyari kananutineikani tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika»[cite: 1726, 1727].

Hiki 'ukirawetsixi xeitewiyari heimana nauka meta yunaukati memayeneniere mekaniutihixima'uni meta nenewieri Kakaiyari mekaniupitiani 'uwenitsie maka [cite: 1731], mipaita mete'ikihiaweti: «Mipai ketiuyini[cite: 1732]. Kakaiyari hepaitsita 'aixia xekeneutiyuaneni»[cite: 1733].

Hikita 'uweni manuwe niuki kanayeneni mipai 'utaiti: «'Aixia xekeneutiyuaneni takakaiyari hepaitsita, yunaiti te'i'uximayatsiriwamete [cite: 1735], tiri meta 'ukirawetsixi [cite: 1735], yunaiti xeheyemakati xemeyexeiya»[cite: 1736].

Hikita niukite waikawa nekaniu'enieni [cite: 1738], haa 'amipa hepai ti'eniiriikime, tiranari mitirikaiye hepai[cite: 1738]. Mipai mekaniutiyuanekaitini: «Kakaiyari hepaitsita 'aixia xekeneutiyuaneni[cite: 1739]. Ti'aitame 'ari kanitsutiani ti'aitati takakaiyari, Naimekimitirikaiye[cite: 1739].

Tepitatemamawieka meta temawierika tepexeiyani [cite: 1740, 1741], meta witsitikuxaxatsiwame tepayeitiaka[cite: 1742]. 'Ari tukari kanaye'ani Muxa mitineikeki[cite: 1743]. 'Iyaya mayani puyukuha'aritia[cite: 1743],

rinu 'ixurikiyari 'aixia mi'ane kaniyetuiriyarieni menakatikiniki [cite: 1744], mi'itiya meta mutimerika»[cite: 1744]. (Rinu 'ixurikiyari kani'iniariyaritini, heitseriemeki me'u'uwati memite'uximaya mepatsieti) [cite: 1745].

Hiki niuki tuayame mipai pinetiutahiawixi: «'Aixia mekani'itiarieka kemi'ane memuta'inierie [cite: 1746], Muxa mitineiketsie memitekwaniki»[cite: 1750]. Mipaita kanetiniutahiawe: «'Iki Kakaiyari niukieya kaniyuritini»[cite: 1750].

Hiki hetiana nekaniutihiximakeni nenewieri ne'ipitianike[cite: 1751]. Miki matsi mipai pinetiutahiawixi: «Tixai yumarima[cite: 1751]. 'Ahepai ne nekatini'uximayatametini [cite: 1752], 'a'iwama memiyuhekiata Ketsutsi hetsia memiemetetiti wahepai nepiti'uximayatame[cite: 1752]. Kakaiyari xeikia nenewieri kenepitiaka[cite: 1753]. Kemi'ane miyuhekiata Ketsutsi hetsia miemetiti, miki 'iyari kanexeiyani katinihekiatani»[cite: 1753].

Manata muyuawi nekaniuxeiya reuyepiekame [cite: 1755], meta kawayu heutuxati mana kaniuwekaitini[cite: 1755]. Manakatei Yamitikamie meta Yurimaine katinitewakaitini[cite: 1755]. Heitseriemeki yatikamieti kaniwaranutaxiriwani meta kuyaxa kaniwewieka[cite: 1756].

Hixiteya tai mitaka hepai pitiyuxexeiyakai [cite: 1757], yumu'utsie waikawa kuruna panamanakai [cite: 1757], meta kemititewa kana'utiakaitini [cite: 1757], peru xewiti 'atsipikatimaikai kemititewa [cite: 1757], miki xeikia yapitimaikai[cite: 1757].
'Ixuriki xuriyamakame 'anakatiti[cite: 1758]. «Kakaiyari Niukieya» katinitewaka[cite: 1759].
Kuyaximama muyuawitsie miemete mekaneweiyakaitini [cite: 1760], kawayutsixi memeutuxa wahetsie me'uteti [cite: 1760], meta rinu 'ixurikiyari, mutuxa meta mi'itiyatika me'anakatitikaiti[cite: 1760].

Tetana 'ixipara meutixikakauni kaniwayeneikakaitini [cite: 1760], kimana miwatiwiteniki nuiwarite[cite: 1760]. «Pitiwa'aitia tepia 'itsiyari 'akweti»[cite: 1760]. Mikititi kanihikitini kaxie takari mitiketsini kaxie pinameta [cite: 1764], Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye haxiaya mayaniki[cite: 1764].
Kamixayatsie meta teurieyatsie mipai pire'ukai kemititewa [cite: 1765]: Ti'aitame, te'aitamete tiwa'aitiwame, meta Kutsiyari wakutsiyari[cite: 1766].

Merikitsi xeime niuki tuayame nekaniuxeiya tau hetsie 'aweme [cite: 1767], yunaime wikixi muyuawitsie memuwitikika kaniwahiwiekaitini mipai tiwakuhiaweti: «Xekenakini, xekeneuyukuxeiri, Kakaiyari 'ikwai waikawa piwewieni[cite: 1767],

te'aitamete wawaiyari xekeneutikwa'i [cite: 1768], kuyaxi wa'ukiyarima wawaiyari [cite: 1768], memitirikawi wawaiyari [cite: 1768], wakawayutsixi wawaiyari [cite: 1768], miki wahetsie memutekai wawaiyari [cite: 1768], yunaiti memuyuni'a memite'uximayatamete tiri 'ukirawetsixi yunaime wawaiyari»[cite: 1768].

Hiki yeutanaka nekaniuxeiya [cite: 1769], meta kwiepa te'aitamete yukuyaxima mewaruwititi [cite: 1769], mekaniyukuxeirieni memitamieniki miki kawayu hetsie manaka meta kuyaximama wahepaitsita[cite: 1769].

Hiki yeutanaka meta tixaxatame miti'itawakai hamatiana kaniuwiyarieni [cite: 1770], kemi'ane 'iniari mitiwewiwakai yeutanaka hixie [cite: 1770], kimana mitiwa'iriwiyakai miki memitanaki'eri yeutanaka tseyuya miki nenewieri memipitiakai meta 'ikiyari memayexeiyakai[cite: 1770]. Miki yuhutati me'ayeneniereti harakuna mita'atsie 'atsupireki mekaneukaxiriyani[cite: 1771].
Hipati yunaiti mekaniukwi'iwa kawayutsie manaka tetana 'ixipara wayeneikakaku [cite: 1772], meta yunaiti memite'awiwawe miki wawaiyariki mekaniutihuxani[cite: 1776, 1777].
Merikitsi manata niuki tuayame nekaniuxeiya muyuawitsie 'akamiekame yawi 'akwekame para mirewatiyepieniki meukatewatsie [cite: 1780], meta karena kaunariyari 'amipa 'ahurieti[cite: 1780].
Hiki miki kuu kaniuwiya meripaiti mieme Kauyumarie meta Tsatanaxi mihiki [cite: 1781], kanekuwieni xeimiriyari wiyari[cite: 1781].

Meukatewatsie kaneikahiani kanenunani [cite: 1782], kiteniena kanitseyumani [cite: 1782], mikatiwa'iriwiyaniki nuiwarite mexi'akuxi ka'aye'awekai xeimiriyari wiyari[cite: 1782]. 'Anake kaniyiwemiki mixinarieniki yapaimexia[cite: 1782].

Hiki te'aitamete wa'uwenite nekaniuxeiya mana 'a'ukame[cite: 1783]. Hetsiena mekanayaxe miki heitserie memupitiarie[cite: 1783]. Mekani'itsikatetikaitini kememite'upitiarie[cite: 1783]. Hiki hipameta nekaniwaruxeiya [cite: 1784], miki wamu'u manutiwitekiexia memiyuhekiatakaiki Ketsutsi hetsia memiemetetiti [cite: 1784], meta Kakaiyari niukieya memikuxatakaiki[cite: 1784]. Nenewieri yeutanaka memikapitiakai meta 'ikiyari, tseyuya memika'utanaki'eri yukanata meta yumamatsie, miki wa'iyarite nekaniuxeiya[cite: 1785]. Miki me'anutaneniereka [cite: 1786], meta Kiritsitu hamatia te'aitamete mekanakine xeimiriyari wiyari[cite: 1786].

'Iki matiarie miemete memanuku'uitiarie mekanihikitini [cite: 1787], 'ana 'akuxi hipati mikite mepika'anutanenierixi [cite: 1787], xeimiriyari wiyari 'aye'akuke mekananutaneniere 'imatiremete[cite: 1787].

'Aixia mekani'itiarieka, meta mekanipatsieka kemi'ane matiari miemetsie memanuku'uitiarie[cite: 1791]. Hutarieka miiya tirikariya pikahexeiya wahepaitsita [cite: 1791], miki matsi mawari wewiwamete mepihikitini Kakaiyari hetsiemiemete meta Kiritsitu hetsiemiemete [cite: 1791], hamatiana te'aitamete mepihikitini xeimiriyari wiyari[cite: 1791].
Merikitsi kepauka haye'ayu xeimiriyari wiyari [cite: 1792], Kauyumarie kanixinariemiki manutahiiyatsie[cite: 1793],
