meta kaniwatiyeimiki nuiwarite mitiwa'iriwiyaniki tatserieta ta'utata tahixiata tatsutiapai memetitei kwiepa -kukitari meta makukitari- [cite: 1794], yunaime kaniwakuxeirimiki memiyutakwiniki [cite: 1794], haramara tetsita xiekari mitika hepai meyupaimeti[cite: 1794].

Hiki kwie manuye'atikatsie paiti mekaneutayeixiani [cite: 1795], meta Kakaiyari teiterimama memakuteitsie warita mekanikutekaitini [cite: 1795], kiekari minaki'eriwa[cite: 1795]. Peru tai muyuawitsie kanakanemiki miki kaniwatixitsitiamiki yunaime[cite: 1796].

Kauyumarie mitiwa'iriwiyakai mana kaneukahiiyamiki harakuna 'atsupireki mita'atsie [cite: 1797], manata yeutanaka meta tixaxatame miti'itawa hamatia mekaneukaxiriyakuni[cite: 1797]. Mana tukariki meta tikariki mekateniuka'eniwakuni yuheyemeki tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika[cite: 1798].

Hiki 'uweni mituxa mimariwe nekaniuxeiya [cite: 1800], xewiti mikitsie makatei[cite: 1801]. Hixiena kwie meta muyuawi naiti kaniyupataxiani mana memikatiteniki [cite: 1801], huyeri pukumawerixia[cite: 1801].

Hikita mikite nekaniwaruxeiya 'ukirawetsixi meta tiri yunaime [cite: 1805], 'uweni manuwe hixie meti'ukame[cite: 1805]. Xapate kananutayepiyaxiani [cite: 1806], meta xewiti, tukari memexeiyaniki xapayari [cite: 1806], hiki mikite mekaniuta'iwawiyarieni kememite'uyuri hepaitsita [cite: 1806], kemire'utiariekai xapatetsie[cite: 1806].
Mana haramara yimikite kaniwayetuani [cite: 1807], miya meta tai mita'a mikita mekaniwayetuani [cite: 1807], Yuxexuiti mekaniuta'iwawiyarieni kememite'uyuriexia hepaitsita[cite: 1808].
Miiya meta tai mita'a harakuna mita'a hetsie mekaneukaxiriyani[cite: 1809]. 'Iki harakuna mita'a, hutarieka mieme miya kanihikitini[cite: 1809].
Kemi'ane tukari mexeiyani xapayaritsie mika'aka'utsieni [cite: 1810, 1811], miki harakuna mita'atsie kaneukahiiyamiki[cite: 1812, 1813].
Hikita muyuawi mihekwa meta kwie mihekwa nekaniuxeiya [cite: 1815], meripaiti mieme muyuawi meta kwie kaneutayeixiani [cite: 1816], yaxeikiata haramara pukumawerixi[cite: 1816].

Metatsiere kiekari mipatsie nekaniuxeiya [cite: 1817], Kerutsareme mihekwa [cite: 1817], muyuawitsie hakamiekame, Kakaiyari manukatsie heyeyaka [cite: 1817], wikiwame hepai witsireyikiniutiati mitiwitini hetsiemieme[cite: 1817].

Hiki niuki nekaniu'enieni 'uweni manuwe 'ayeneikame karima mipai hetaineme: «Hikirixia Kakaiyari yuteiteri watsata kaniuyeikamiki[cite: 1818]. Wahamatia 'ukaiti kanayeimiki[cite: 1818]. Mikita teiterimama mekanihikitikakuni [cite: 1822], Kakaiyarititi wahamatia puyeikani meta piwakakaiyaritini[cite: 1822].

Miki naime wa'ukai kana'itiexiamiki[cite: 1823]. Hatsuakuri mepikakwini [cite: 1823], mepika'utitsuanani [cite: 1823], mepikayuhiwerieka meta mepikate'ukakukuineni [cite: 1823], tita meripaiti mitimiemetikai katiniumaweniri»[cite: 1823].

Hiki 'uwenitsie makatei mipai kaniutayini: «Ne naime hekwame nepirayeitiani»[cite: 1824]. Mipaita kanetiniutahiawe: «Ketinaka'utia, 'iki niuki kaniyuritini meta hetsiena yuri miti'eriekaki»[cite: 1825].

Mipaita pinetiutahiawixi: <<<'Ari naiti katinaye'ani[cite: 1826]. Ne Mexiakame meta 'Imatireme nekanihikitini, nemitsutia meta neminini[cite: 1826]. Kemi'ane meuharimiki, ne neka'ituirieti nekaniharitiamiki nehaixaki kimana tukari mexeiyaniki[cite: 1827].
Kemi'ane mirayu'iwa, hetsiena katininakimiki 'iki naiti [cite: 1828], neta Kakaiyarieya nekanihikitikamiki [cite: 1828], mikita neniwe kanihikitikamiki[cite: 1828].

Peru memamati memukunuaxia [cite: 1829, 1830], yuri memikate'erie [cite: 1831], memiteyumemiwa [cite: 1832], memiyutsewixima [cite: 1833], memiwakumaiwa memikawa'iitama meta memikawakinama [cite: 1834], memiteyukewaiya [cite: 1834], tetexi memiwarayexeiya [cite: 1834], meta yunaiti memite'itawa [cite: 1834], miki yunaime wahetsie pitinakeni harakuna 'atsupireki mita'atsie memeukaxiriyaniki [cite: 1834], hakewa hutarieka memekwinitsie»[cite: 1834].

Hiki 'atahuta niuki tuayamete 'atahuta tekixi memahapakai 'atahuta kwiniyayari 'imatirieka mieme hipineme [cite: 1836], xewiti miki 'ahurawa 'ayaka mipai pinetiutahiawixi: «Kenaye'a, wikiwame nepimatsixeitsitiani Muxa 'iyaya mayani»[cite: 1840].

Hiki 'Iyari hiri 'aminenatsie 'amutewitsie kanenewitini [cite: 1841, 1842], meta kiekari mipatsie kaneniuxeitsitsitiani [cite: 1842], Kerutsareme, muyuawitsie hakamiekame [cite: 1842], Kakaiyari manukatsie heyeyaka[cite: 1842].
Witsipitiyuxexeiyakai Kakaiyari xawatiriyayaki [cite: 1844, 1845], meta tete witsimi'anene hepai katiniyuxexeiyakaitini katsipe teteyari manuyehekia hepai tiyuxexeiyati[cite: 1846, 1847, 1848, 1849].

Yutetsariya 'ahatayeukame meta 'ahautitewame kanexeiyakaitini [cite: 1850], tamamata heimana huta kitenieyari pexeiyakai [cite: 1850], meta xexuime kitenietsie yuxexuiti niuki tuayamete mekanitenihitikateitini [cite: 1850], manata kitenietsie mepa'utikatei kememitetetewa nuiwarite 'Ixaheri niwemama tamamata heimana huta[cite: 1850].
Tau manatineika hepatsie haikakia kanakiteniekaitini [cite: 1851], ta'utata haikakia [cite: 1851], tatserieta haikakia [cite: 1851], meta tatsutia paiti haikakia[cite: 1851].
Kiekari tetsariyayari tamamata heimana hutame tsutimeyari kanexeiyakaitini [cite: 1852], xexuimetsie kememitetetewa tamamata heimana huta ni'ariekate Muxa hetsiemieme mekana'utikateitini[cite: 1852].

Niuki tuayame nehamatia mitikuxatakai huru hakayari kanakwekaitini kiekari mi'iniataki [cite: 1853], kiteniete, meta tetsariyayari naime[cite: 1853]. Hiki kiekari hakaki kaniti'iniata [cite: 1854], huta miriyari heimana huta tsienituyari kirumeturuyari peutatetewakai [cite: 1854]: kemayetewi kemeutitewa meta kematayewa papaimeme pexeiyatikatei 'iniari[cite: 1860, 1861, 1862].

Yaxeikiata tetsariyayari kaniuti'iniata [cite: 1863], haika tewiyari heimana 'auxiwi meturuyari pexeiyakai [cite: 1863] tewi kemitiu'ininiata [cite: 1863], niuki tuayame miki hepai katiniu'iniata[cite: 1863].
Tetsariyayari katsipe teteyariki piwewiyakai [cite: 1864], kiekari naiti huru xeikia pihikitikai [cite: 1868], xikiri maye'itiya hepai tiyuxexeiyati[cite: 1869].

Kiekari tetsariyayari tsutimeyari naiti tetexi witsimi'aneneki kanitetsekaitini [cite: 1865]: mexiakame katsipeki [cite: 1865], hutarieka mieme tsapiruki [cite: 1865], hairieka mieme 'akataki [cite: 1866], naurieka mieme 'etsimeraritaki[cite: 1866],

'auxiwirieka mieme 'unitseki [cite: 1866], 'ataxewirieka mieme kurunarinaki [cite: 1866], 'atahutarieka mieme kiritsurituki [cite: 1866], 'atahairieka mieme weriruki [cite: 1866], 'atanaurieka mieme tupatsiyuki [cite: 1866], tamamata mieme kiritsupiratsuki [cite: 1866], tamamata heimana xewi mieme katsinituki [cite: 1866], meta tamamata heimana hutariekamieme 'amatitsitaki[cite: 1866].

Tamamata heimana huta kiteniete periraki kaniwewiyatikateitini [cite: 1867], xexuiti 'itupari perira puwiriyarietikatei[cite: 1867]. Mexiakame kaye kiekari warie muyekatei huru xeikia pihikitikai [cite: 1868], xikiri mayehekia hepai tiyuxexeiyati[cite: 1869].
Mana tuki nepika'uxei kiekari warie [cite: 1870], Ti'aitame Kakaiyari Naimekimitirikaiye meta Muxa tukieya kanihikitini[cite: 1870].
Kiekari tau meta metseri mihekiariwiekaki pikaheiyehiwa [cite: 1871, 1872], Kakaiyari yuxawatiriyaki piwahekiariwiya [cite: 1873, 1874], meta Muxa wahekiariwiwame kanihikitini[cite: 1875].
Nuiwarite 'amekaniu'uwakuni mipai metehekiariyarieti [cite: 1876], kwiepa te'aitamete tita memitehexeiya witsiti'aneneme mana mekateni'atiakuni[cite: 1877, 1878, 1879, 1882, 1883, 1884].
Wakiteniete tukariki yapireuyepietikani [cite: 1884], manari pikahekuyiyireni[cite: 1885].
Tita memitehexeiya witsiti'aneneme raye'atikaime nuiwarite mekateni'atiiriekuni[cite: 1885].

Hatsuaku hetsiana pikaheutahani tita mikati'itiya [cite: 1886], kakaiyarixi memiwarayexeiya meta memite'itawa [cite: 1886], matsi kemi'ane xeikia Muxa xapayatsie memaka'utiarie tukari mexeiyatsie[cite: 1887].

Merikitsi manata niuki tuayame hatuxame pinetsi'uxeitsitia kimana tukari memexeiyaniki [cite: 1888], manuyehekia hepai tihekiati [cite: 1888], Kakaiyari 'uwenieya manuwe kanayeneikakaitini meta Muxa[cite: 1888],

meta kaye hixiata kiekaritsie kaniuyahanekaitini[cite: 1889]. Hatuxame tetsita 'anataiye meta 'anutaiye 'iteiri kaniutiwekaitini kimana tukari mexeiyani [cite: 1889], tamamata heimana huta mexia kaniukaxuxuawereni [cite: 1889], xexuime metseritsie [cite: 1889], meta 'iteiri xawariyari nuiwarite 'aixia meteheu'erieti memakikaniki kani'ayumiemetini[cite: 1890].
Hatsuakuri 'axamepika'itiarieka[cite: 1890]. Kakaiyari 'uwenieya meta Muxa kiekaritsie mana puweni[cite: 1890]. Te'i'uximayatsiriwamete mepeyexeiyani[cite: 1890],
hixiena mekanixeiyakuni [cite: 1891], meta kemititewa yukanata mekane'utiatikaikuni[cite: 1891].

Pikahekiyiyireniri mana [cite: 1892], kixeme meta tau miwahekiariwiyaniki mepikaheuyehiaka [cite: 1892], matsi Ti'aitame Kakaiyari piwahekiariwiyani[cite: 1892]. Yuheyemeki piti'aitametini tsepaneti xeitsienituyari wiyari manuyekika[cite: 1892].

Hiki niuki tuayame mipai kanetiniutahiawe: «'Iki niuki kaniyuritini meta kaneuyeweka yuri miti'eriekaki[cite: 1896]. Ti'aitame, Kakaiyari 'iyari miwapitia yuniukamete [cite: 1897], miki kaneiyeni'ani yuniuki tuayame yamitiwaxeitsitianiki yuhetsia miemete te'uximayatamete [cite: 1897], miki mipai memitemaikaki kemireuyewetse yamitiyiniki kwitiwa»[cite: 1897].
«Neuxei kwitiwa nepunuani[cite: 1898]. 'Aixia kani'itiariekamiki kemi'ane yamitikamie 'iki xapatsie kemaine»[cite: 1898].

Ne, Wani, nemitiuxei meta nemitiu'eni 'iki naime hepaitsita nekanihikitini[cite: 1899]. Kepauka nemunierixi meta nemu'enaxi [cite: 1900], nekaniutihiximakeni niuki tuayame nenewieri ne'ipitianike naime 'iki minetixeiyatsitiakai[cite: 1900].

Peru miki mipai pinetiutahiawixi: «Yumarima 'aixia[cite: 1901]. Ne 'ahepai nekatini'uximayatametini [cite: 1901], 'a'iwama Kakaiyari niukametemama wahepai [cite: 1901], meta miki yunaiti yamemitekahu 'iki xapa kemaine wahepai[cite: 1901]. Kakaiyari xeikia nenewieri kenepitiaka»[cite: 1902].
Hiki mipai tawarita kanetiniutahiawe: «Pepika'i'awietani niuki tita mitikuxata 'iki xapatsie [cite: 1903], tukari kanehuraniri maye'aniki[cite: 1903].

Kemi'ane 'axamitiuka'iyari 'axaketiyurieneni [cite: 1904], kemi'ane miyutsewixima yaxeikia ketiyutsewiximaka [cite: 1904], kemi'ane heitseriemeki yamitikamie heitseriemeki yaketikamieni [cite: 1904], kemi'ane mipatsie, patsieti ke'uyeikani»[cite: 1904].
«Neuxei kwitiwa nepunuani[cite: 1908]. Ne wa'iwarika nepirapine [cite: 1908], meta yuxexuime nekatiniwayetuiriemiki kememite'uyuriexia[cite: 1908].
Ne Mexiakame 'Imatireme nekatinitewaka [cite: 1909], kemi'ane mitsutia meta minini[cite: 1909].

>>>'Aixia mekani'itiariekakuni kemi'ane yu'ixuriki memi'ekwa [cite: 1910], heitserie mekanexeiyakakuni miki 'iteiri tukari mexeiya hepaitsita [cite: 1910], meta memipitiarieniki kiekari kitenie memeutahaxianiki[cite: 1910].

Peru Kiekari warie tsiikiri mekaniu'uwakuni [cite: 1911], miki memiteyukewaiya [cite: 1911], mikawa'iya mikawakina memiwakumaiwa [cite: 1911], memiteyumemiwa [cite: 1911], tetexi memiwarayexeiya [cite: 1911], meta naiti mitiwanake [cite: 1911], meta memite'itawa[cite: 1911].

»Ne, Ketsutsi, neniuki tuayame nekaneni'ani mipai mitixehekiatianiki hakewa xemeyutixexeiriwa[cite: 1912]. Ne nana nekanihikitini Rawiri hetsie nemiyenuiwaxi [cite: 1913], xurawe mixawati ximeri paiti manatineika»[cite: 1913].

'Iyari meta wikiwame mipai mekaniutiyuaneni: «Kenaye'a»[cite: 1914]. Kemi'ane mi'ena mipai ke'utayini: «Kenaye'a»[cite: 1914]. Kemi'ane meuharimiki, miki ke'ayani [cite: 1915], meta kemi'ane miyuwairiya, katuiriyarieti ke'anuhareni kimana tukari mexeiyaniki[cite: 1915].

Ne yunaime 'ipai nepitiwaraye'eritiwa 'iki xapatsie niuki kemaine memi'enie [cite: 1916]: Xika xewiti 'iki niuki 'anutiyatsa, yaxeikiata Kakaiyari penutiyatsirieni kwiniya 'ipitiati 'iki xapatsie kemire'uxa[cite: 1916].

Meta xika xewiti 'iki xapatsie kemaine niuki xika 'anakatiki [cite: 1917], Kakaiyari kaninawairiemiki miki tukari mexeiya hepaitsita meta kiekari mipatsie [cite: 1921], 'iki xapatsie kemire'uxa[cite: 1922].
Kemi'ane mipai mitihekiata mipai kanaineni: «Huu, kwitiwa nepunuani»[cite: 1923]. Mipai ketiiyini[cite: 1924]. Kenaye'a Ti'aitame Ketsutsi[cite: 1924].
Ti'aitame Ketsutsi 'aixia ketiuka'iyarini yunaime xehetsiemieme[cite: 1921]. Mipai ketiiyini[cite: 1921].
